2a1(phal chen): sdud pa dang / rab tu dbye ba
2a2(phal chen): da phrad pa dang / spyo byon sgom yang dag par bstan pa dang / 
2a3(phal chen): rjes su zhus pa dang / 
2a4(phal chen): khring du chud par bya ba dang / 
2a5(phal chen): yang dag pa ru gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bslab pa rmasngon du skye ba dang / 
2b1(phal chen): dang nub byang na gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re la ci snyed pa cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
2b2(phal chen): khams gcig na sku tshe gcig gas thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ci snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas la gsol zhing / snying po byang chub la zhugs
2b3(phal chen): nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas zhugs
2b4(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 
2b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gi khams bye ba khrag khrig
2b6(phal chen): brgya phrag stong dang / 'jog rten gyi khams 'dzem bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / grong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdolo shin tu phra ba snyed dang / snang gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
2b7(phal chen): rtal shin du phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum ga 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
2b8(phal chen): ba'i rdul sha ni du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten g+hi khams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gas thogs pa ji snyed cig rdzogs bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol/ 
2b9(phal chen): cing snying po byang chub la zhugs nas/ 'dud sde rang+gA bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba
13a1(phal chen): bzhini du lhag phyogs dang / de phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / 
13a2(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe'i tshad gcig gis thogs pa'i ji snyed cig bzhugs
13a3(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kho zas las gsol zhing snying po byang chub tu zhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
13a4(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyikhams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gi khams stong dang
13a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya phrag steng dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag snyed/ dang / 'dzag
13a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrag brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'dzam bu gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / glong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 
13a7(phal chen): steng gi 'jig rten ga khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
13a8(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snad nas/ rigs kyi bu steng phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / byang chub
13a9(phal chen): sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gas thogs pa ci snyed cig gzhugs de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu zhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas par
13b1(phal chen): mdzad do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo'i 'khor bung stong phrag bcu po de dag mthong ngo // smras pa 'phags pa bdag
13b2(phal chen): gis mthong // rigs kyi bu bud med 'di dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu kho mo dang / bskal pa mnyam par spyod pa smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa
13b3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i brgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam rnam par dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang bskal pa mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ bskal pa mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa
13b4(phal chen): bskal pa mnyam par blo tshang par 'gyur ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ bskal pa mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gyengs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par spyod yul
13b5(phal chen): gyi yul dang ldan pa bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par don blar rtogs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi don rton pa/ bskal pa
13b6(phal chen): mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ bskal pa mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ bskal pa mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gis mi thub pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrog pa/ skal
13b7(phal chen): pa mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du med pas/ rnam par spyod pa thams cad la ba bskal pa mnyam par yon tan rnam mnya par dag pa las kyi rnam par
13b8(phal chen): sman pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pas bskal pa mnyam par las kyi rnam par sman pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba pa thams cad yongs su skyob pas bskal pa mnyam par byams
13b9(phal chen): pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas mi sko ba'i phyir bskal pa mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba
14a1(phal chen): bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa lus yongs su bstan pas bskal pa mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi 'dres pa'i
14a2(phal chen): tshig gi tha snyad la bskal pa mnyam par drug gi les rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor kyi 'khor dkyil 'khor tu bskal par 'dod pa sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim 'gro
14a3(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bskal pa mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal pa mnyam pa mngon du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ 
14a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la ba skal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ rnam par dag pa sha stag gcig kyang yod de// rigs kyi bu stong phrag bcu po 'di
14a5(phal chen): dag kyang / skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe'i gcig gis thogs pa zhal/ zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par
14a6(phal chen): 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing // srid pa'i tha ma dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs
14a7(phal chen): bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shang phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ yid dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongasu tsham par byed do// 
14a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 'di nyid nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongasu tshim par byed do// klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis gnod sbyin rnams ni gnon sbyin gi kha zas kyis// / 
14a9(phal chen): dri za rnams ni dri ba'i kha zas kyis// lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis/ nam mkha' lding rnams nA nam mkha'i ldang gi kha zas kyis/ mu 'am ci rnams ni mi 'am ci
14b1(phal chen): rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhag la/ rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in dra ni la sna tshogs kyis sbas pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcags
14b2(phal chen): bor gyi dra bas legs par blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can/ rin po che lnga brgya tsam gas gzugs legs par rgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi bstan sna tshogs pa ting ba/ 
14b3(phal chen): ga ma yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mang po bsgreng ga rin po che tu ma'i dra bas kun tu g.yog pa/ rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang rin po che'i
14b4(phal chen): me tog gi wa ldi mang po bke bzhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa/ bye dur+ya las byas pa ni drung nas bsgred zhing bzung / gal
14b5(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i rdul ya ba dang pa'i rgyal po lta bu ni legs par g.yab/ spos kyi rim gro'i yo byad sna chog/ sa kyis ni gdungs shing bsangs/ rol mo gdung ba dang / 
14b6(phal chen): dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi dbyings las 'das par sgra 'byin po lnga brgya tsam gis/ g.yas g.yon nas gdung zhing bkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na mkhod pa'i sems can rnams shin
14b7(phal chen): tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du/ lha rjes kyi me tog gi sman gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu rtsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam par
14b8(phal chen): spyod spyod/ bag nyan tsang ci dga' ba byed/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gis shin du brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa lha dang / mi'i gzugs las
14b9(phal chen): she ni du 'das pa sha stag gsi kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag
17a1(phal chen): mkhas mal len rgya so dr-I ma r+ya g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa
17a2(phal chen): bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shan tu bde ba la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i
17a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi srid pa'i rlan shin tu bskam
17a4(phal chen): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems
17a5(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sa dang dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can
17a6(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems
17a7(phal chen): can thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du bzung bar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ 
17a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dgadams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa
17b1(phal chen): mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa'iji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems da/ 
17b2(phal chen): rnams sems can thams cad kyi brten du gyur pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces sbas pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangasA la 'di skad ces smras so// / 
17b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs// 
17b4(phal chen): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro/ 
17b5(phal chen): bas mi skye ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim 'gro bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yod mi dbade ba mi bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes nya gnyen
17b6(phal chen): btsal ba las phya ri mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mes shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gri dor blta ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang // 
17b7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul zhim pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gshanyen la rim 'gro dang / bsten ba kur bya bas mi skyo ba de / lta bu ni shin tu bkon no// rigs
17b8(phal chen): kyi bu khyod kyis kho bI 'khor 'di dag na mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos ngan song bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
18a1(phal chen): na sems bskyed pa dgra ste/ 'dun kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni khro zos pha rol du phyin pa sdud de/ gsol ba'o// 
18a2(phal chen): 'di dag ni na kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig
18a3(phal chen): rten gi rigs las gyen tu bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gi las kyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o// / 
18a4(phal chen): 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'kho lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud tu ltung nga ba las yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid
18a5(phal chen): khong tu chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can tha ma sa cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho
18a6(phal chen): bos yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob po ste/ de'i mthus kho bos zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin par byed do// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / 
18a7(phal chen): ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la re'i dam pa dang / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / glag pa 'dod pa rnams la glag pa dang / mur ba 'dod pa
18a8(phal chen): rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / gtug
18a9(phal chen): pa 'dod pa rnams la gdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la bye ma dang / rgyan dang lha ba lbu ba 'dod pa rnams la brgyan dang lha ba lta ba dang / 
18b1(phal chen): la khod kyi tsal 'khor du ldad tu 'dzad pa'i gtam gyi rgyal bur gyur pa shasag kun nas 'dus pa zhing mkhod ma mkha pa bzung // rig dang dbu pa'i nang da byang chub sems
18b2(phal chen): tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo // rim khang bcu'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / sbyar ba dang 'byung ba
18b3(phal chen): dang smon lam rgya mtsho dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu rmugs
18b4(phal chen): dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin gis rlabs dang bcas par mthong // mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phung la 'di skad ces smras so// 
18b5(phal chen): 'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mngon na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu snang ba mdza mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba su zhig la yongs su bskrun
18b6(phal chen): bsgrung des sbas pa rags kyi bu kho bo dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyeng 'das po'i yang pha rol cig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor la sa
18b7(phal chen): tshogs shes par bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa 'jig rten bde bar
18b8(phal chen): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye
18b9(phal chen): shes rnam par snang ba la sags pa/ nyan thos bye bo phrag 'argya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gtso brjid la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya stong dang / thabs rtsa gcig tu rgyal mtshas
24a1(phal chen): kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rin po che rgyal mtshan rgyad kyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
24a2(phal chen): de grong khyer du gshegs pa nas/ tshong dus kyi slang nas bzhud pa'o che/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la// 
24a3(phal chen): mchod par bya ba'i phyir bsil bstan dang / rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri la lu gcig gcig kyang bsregs te/ gtugs spos kyis bsangs so// spos kyi ril lu gcig
24a4(phal chen): bu de de ltar bsregs pas zhag btun du 'dzam bu'i klu du thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi spa ni kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas
24a5(phal chen): yongs su khyebs par gyur to// spos kyi ni bun bya sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhini gshegs pa ni bsam gis mi khyab pa ste/ dus gsu
24a6(phal chen): tu dri ma med pa'i ye shes rad kyi phung po dang ldan pa/ 'o// thams cad mkhyen pa ste sgribs pa thams cad mi mthong ba'o// // nyon mongs pa'i bag chags cha thams cad yongs su byang
24a7(phal chen): ba ste/ de bzhini gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol
24a8(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// zhes de skad du kho bos dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir spos kyi na bun gyi
24a9(phal chen): sIn de las sangs rgyas kyi byin gi brlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
24b1(phal chen): kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum ga zhe na/ 'di ltar 'ongs pa thams cad shin du rgyun gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i
24b2(phal chen): bshes gshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho bos
24b3(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon te na rin po che tshad med pa
24b4(phal chen): 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya ma tshe dang tha mi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha mi tha dad pa'i chos kyi dasprin gi char yang dag par mdzan pa tha mo dad pa'i yin
24b5(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i/ dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tha ma/ dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dang
24b6(phal chen): thams cad tha mi dad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gcig tu gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cong rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa/ na dus gsum tha mi dad
24b7(phal chen): bar mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongs su gnas bAr mi skyo ba// kun tu lta ba tha mi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gis spyod pa shes pa
24b8(phal chen): 'am yon tan brjod par nus ro skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul sde'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon kun
24b9(phal chen): spos spos tshong kun du lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan tu song la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / nan ji ltar nan tan du bya
25a1(phal chen): pa dris shi gi/ de nas tshong dpon gi nor gzangs kyis chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin
25a2(phal chen): chen gtsug phud pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te// chos kyi cheng dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo // shin du rgyas pa
25a3(phal chen): chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa// bam po dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
25a4(phal chen): nor bzangs sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la zhugs pa nga / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha'
25a5(phal chen): yas pa'i tshul kyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas par mngon par brlan pas sha ni du rtog/ sa pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
25a6(phal chen): mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyis rnam par dag pa// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su
25a7(phal chen): song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gis mi thub pa med pa/ mtha' yas pa'i
25a8(phal chen): rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de mthar gyis
25a9(phal chen): yul sku'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen 'khor kun dang / sgong dang gzhod dang mnyam
25b1(phal chen): brjod cing / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i yongs su ston to// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung tu med pa yongs su bstan cing / snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// 
25b2(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsngags pa yang dag par bsngags shing yon tan chad med pa thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// sems can thams
25b3(phal chen): cad yongs su snyan par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan la cing theg ma chen po'i smon lam 'azung ba'i rgyu yongs su smin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su thams cad dang
25b4(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa dri bshin tu rgyas par bshad cing / byang chub sems nga'i kun du 'bang po'i spyong pa thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu
25b5(phal chen): yongs su ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yo sa su bsngags pashang mtshan ma dang dpe byad b.rapas brgyan cing ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thob pa dang / 
25b6(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yongs su brjod cing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su dag pa thams cad tu 'gro ba thob pa dang / 'byung
25b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// dpyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'arjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gos mi khyab de
25b8(phal chen): rgyud yongs su bstan to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thub par dka' ba yongs su bston to// bsam gtan gyi rol
25b9(phal chen): tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zil gis ma non la/ zil kyis non pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
27a1(phal chen): brjod cing / chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to// thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i
27a2(phal chen): sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston cing / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / bskal pa thams cad kyi dus 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i
27a3(phal chen): sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su
27a4(phal chen): ston to// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba/ bzhin tu tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongasu
27a5(phal chen): na to// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la rnam pa ldog pa yongs su brjod cing / lta na phul tu bzang ba'i rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// de ltar de dag
27a6(phal chen): chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/ nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do// yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos dang / gdug spos
27a7(phal chen): dang bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal tu med pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po se dra ba ra la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi 'pham pa
27a8(phal chen): la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal bde la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la sogs pa dang / sras kyi rgyal po du sa dang mthun pa la sogs pa dang / sros kyi
27a9(phal chen): rgyal po'i sbrul bsting po'i tsan dan la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sIn gi a ka ru la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po'i mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi
27b1(phal chen): chung ba'i lnga ldi de dag thams cad las kyang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas mngon par sbyangs pa dag ste/ de ltar grong khyer chen po de dag thams cad ni/ nor bu rin po che'i drabs grangs
27b2(phal chen): bang pas kun nas khyabs pa'o// rin po che'i dril du g.yer ka'i dra bas grangs med pa kun nas khyibs pa'o// lha rdzas kyi sras kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khyebs po'o// lha rdzas kyi
27b3(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas grangs med pas kun nAs khebs pa'o// rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba grangs med pas kun na khyengs pa'o// rdo rje'i bla re'i grangs med pas kun nas khyengs pa'i ram
27b4(phal chen): po che'i bu re grangs med pas kun nas khyengs pa'o// rin po che'i gdugs kyi bla re grangs med pas kun nas khyabs pa'o// rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs ze'i bla re grangs med pa
27b5(phal chen): kun nas khyebs pa'o// gos rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khyebs pa'o// me tog gi phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khyebs po'o// rin po cher
27b6(phal chen): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs btsugs shang bsgreng ba ste/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dus su rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs pa'i pho brang brtsigs pa/ 'khor kun du dpag
27b7(phal chen): tshad bzhi yod pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs du rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskur ba'o// rin po che'i dral bu yang du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par
27b8(phal chen): 'khrol ba'i drang rim bdun gyis smre kun nas 'byung ba'o// rin po che sna bdun byi ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan brgya
27b9(phal chen): stong bas ma bye 'i khya pa dang ldan ga'o/ su/ rdzing bu rin po sna tshogs tu ma las byas pa/ gsel gyi gra pa kun du bkram pa/ yan lag rgyal rgyang dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi
37a1(phal chen): ud pa la dang bang mo dang / ku mu ta dang me tog pun da ri ka sa chu'i steng kun tu g.yog pa/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs rab tu brgyan pa phyogs bzhi nas rin
37a2(phal chen): po che'i 'gus brtsegs pa'i theb tshwas dab par bkye ba ca gis shin du badzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du'ang ba 'byed pa'i bye bran sna tshogs kyis snga shin du 'byung ba yang
37a3(phal chen): lha'i dbang po'i pho zang dang 'gran pa ste/ de'i dbus na rin po che 'gro bsnang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa shani tu nga'as bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba rin po che grangs med pa'i brgyan bsam gyis mi khya
37a4(phal chen): bas gya nom par brgyan pa/ yod de de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugaso// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rin po che'i 'ongs
37a5(phal chen): de dag la ni chags pa'o sems med// rin po che/ dra ba de dag la ni ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid meng / rin po che d+ha la phreng ba de dag len 'dod cing chags pa med// rin po
37a6(phal chen): dril bu 'dra ba'i sgra la no ro myong bar byed pa med/ lha rjes kyi rol mo'i sgra dang / glu ro snyan pa'i sgra dang / dbyangs la na chags pa'i sems med// tshe rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang dang
37a7(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod ni yid la bya ba med par shan tu dga' bar gyur pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi dga' bas mos pas shAn du dga' nang gzugs dang sa
37a8(phal chen): dang / dri dang ro dang / reg la dga' bas dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos nges par rtag pa la shin du mos pas sems can gang dang phrag ba kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu 'dri zhing mthar kyis
37a9(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lam gi sum mdo'i drung zhig tu bltas nas/ grong khyer gi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus zhig na gyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas/ ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri rin po
37b1(phal chen): nga'o// dge ba'i bshes gshen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston to// dge ba'i bshin gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i cho
37b2(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'as de ltar du gang sde sngags 'dod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khor ba'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu phye ba nad 'brang zhing yang dag
37b3(phal chen): bar bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad mdzer to// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gang mas ngag la zhugs pa
37b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nams kyang thugs shin du dgos par 'gyur ba lani/ dge pa'i bshes gnyen gi tshig dang / mi 'gal bar gan
37b5(phal chen): bya'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni thams cad mkhyen nyid yang shin tu bsnyen pa yin dge ba'i bshes gnyis nag la the tsom ma ba pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dag rje
37b6(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsten pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yadri la bya ba dang / mo bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du gyur pa yin gyis/ rigs
37b7(phal chen): kyi bu rgyal po'i bro brang brtan por dge snyen ma tha g.yo ba gangan pa der song shig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ting
37b8(phal chen): 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las las nas/ mthar kyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba gnas pa der song nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol ba zhing rmed rmed pa
37b9(phal chen): las/ de las 'gro ba mang po bstan pa rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni/ rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'grogs shing / gzhon nur pa gyur pa ste/ rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis
46a1(phal chen): yongs su bskor zhing / skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' ba chen po dang mos pas shing spos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan
46a2(phal chen): pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gi sgo sdong pa'i tshe/ des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa gser gi
46a3(phal chen): kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gas khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi mu nor bzangs la phog par gyur ma thag tu/ tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin sgo mang po dang / 
46a4(phal chen): zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams card dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gi sgo meng po dang / kun tu lta'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin
46a5(phal chen): snyeg pa pa mdzas kyang ba ban kyi rnam ba'i mgasakyi 'ating nge lan pa kya sa brgyargya stsal zhugs par byar/ ngas su bye na// de drug kyi nan dupa 'a gnan ma
46a6(phal chen): 'di ltar dper na thog ma mngal tu zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur te// des drinam po zhig tshor na 'ang de ni lha yang yong lha'i
46a7(phal chen): mo'ang med/ klu la yang med klu bu mo la yang med/ gnod spyan la yang med gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med/ dri za la yang med dri za'i bu mo la yang med/ lha ma ya ni la yang med lha ma yin kyi bu mo
46a8(phal chen): la yang med/ nam mkha'i lding yang med na mkha' lding gi bu mo yang med/ mi 'am ci yang med mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yeng med/ lto 'phye chen po la yang med lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med// mi la yang med
46a9(phal chen): mo'o bu mo la yang med/ cing mi srid pa'i de lta bu'o zhim po tshor bar gyur to// bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi na med na/ lhag po lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin
46b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang kha dog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog ma rtog par de'i kha dog dang mdog tu mnyam pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi med na lhag pa lha ga las
46b2(phal chen): 'ong lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang dbyings dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur 'a thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs ma rtogs par/ de'i
46b3(phal chen): lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs su mnyam pa/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten na med na/ lhag par lta ga la 'ong / 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang su
46b4(phal chen): bathab pa'i 'od kyi rgyan pa rtogs par de'i 'od kyi rkyen dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med/ lhag pa'i lta ba sa 'ang // del ba'i ngadakyis dran tho ba dang mnyam pa'i drongal du mtho
46b5(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten go lhag pa'i gnas sam/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
46b6(phal chen): gnas na med na/ lhag pa lta ga las 'od / khyim gi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma rtog
46b7(phal chen): de'i khyim ga rkyen dang long skyong du mnyam pa yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na yang med na/ lhag pa'i lci ba las 'ang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor bun
46b8(phal chen): sum tshogs pa ma rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun du mtshogs pa martags la pa/ de g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rted kyi meng na lhag par gyu
46b9(phal chen): was 'dus dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis lha ba nus/ bri sems can de la bu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi sems can gyi ris na med do// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong
47a1(phal chen): ma thag rgya nyon mongs pazhi bar mi 'gyur ba do lta bu'i sems can yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi risan med do// 'di lta steng dper dngangs pa chen po stong brgya phrag bcul dang
47a2(phal chen): gyur ba la ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyu'o// de bzhin tu dge bsnyen mi mi g.yo ba'ang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i mi chu'o// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la bstan pa
47a3(phal chen): ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can lta bu 'am/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma rtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// dge bsnyen
47a4(phal chen): ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sa gzhi dang grong khyer dang / rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med
47a5(phal chen): pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i brgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sgrub pa mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim por tsher nas/ 'khor mtsho
47a6(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen mi g.yo ba la
47a7(phal chen): tshigs su bcad ba 'dis bstod do// khyed kyis tshum rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrungs te/ bzod pa shin du yangs pa'ang yongs su bsgom mdzad cing // brtson 'grus rten pa rdo rje lta bu sgrubs pa na/ 
47a8(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod de// 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
47a9(phal chen): ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i smod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te
47b1(phal chen): 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos nas/ 'phags pa ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa
47b2(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bshad du gsol// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba nyams bde bas/ tshong dben gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar
47b3(phal chen): gyur pa'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legs so// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems
47b4(phal chen): dpa'i rnams par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgo yid dam brtan pa la slob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o// kho mo ni
47b5(phal chen): spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o// kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems
47b6(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa thug par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis yid dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang
47b7(phal chen): chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spros pa snang ba'i sgo// chos sgo yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis// smras pa gnas 'di ni yid ches dka'o// smras pa
47b8(phal chen): 'phags ma bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na/ yad lha ches par mchis grang / rtogs pa dang 'tshal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa
47b9(phal chen): dang / rig pa dang dmigs su phebs pa dang / goms pa dang mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid par yang mchis grangs/ de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas
48a1(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngod 'das pa'i dus shig tu/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten
48a2(phal chen): du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu cig ma zhig tu gyur nas/ de'i tshe nub mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad/ pa dang ma yang nyal skyes pa dang bud med kyang gnyid kyis log
48a3(phal chen): rol mo dang gtung ba dang bkrol ba'i sgra yang zhi/ lhan cig skyed pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/ kho mo lam gyi steng na 'dug cing nam mkha' dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi
48a4(phal chen): phreng ba dam par 'khod pa la lta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brgyang ba/ ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar/ lha dang
48a5(phal chen): klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / 'khor mang pos bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba
48a6(phal chen): phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 
48a7(phal chen): des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur/ yid shin du dga' bar 'gyur te/ lam gyi steng nas langs nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
48a8(phal chen): pa phyag rab tu brgyang pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na'ang mtha' thug par ma rung g.yas g.yon gyi tshad zan par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsam na'ang ngoms par ma rung ste/ 
48a9(phal chen): de'i tshe kho mos 'di snyam du bsams so// las ji lta bu zhig byas na lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni thob par 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od kyi rgyan phun sum
48b1(phal chen): tshogs pa ni 'thung bar 'gyur 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyis gnas dang longs spyod phur sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'asod nams phun sum tshogs par 'byung ba
48b2(phal chen): bar 'gyur/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang
48b3(phal chen): dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'angs de bzhini
48b4(phal chen): gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba des/ kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig/ 
48b5(phal chen): mngon par zhen pa thams cad bstsal ba'i phyir/ 'jam pa med pa'i sems bskyed cing / chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig/ sems can bsdam pa mi b.rang ba nga
48b6(phal chen): ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i glong du ltung ba'i mi bskul ba'i sems bskyed cig/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du bskyed pa'i skye mched bu mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa
48b7(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems bskyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu bzung ba'i phyir mchog mi shes pa'i sems bskyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul
48b8(phal chen): snang ba rtogs pa bya ba'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i sems bskyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems bskyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs
48b9(phal chen): pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba blta ci zhig smos kyi/ chung ngu na bdar bya tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam par ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam
49a1(phal chen): par dbye ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i sems bskyed cig/ zhes byung ste de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas phyag rab tu
49a2(phal chen): brgyang ba las/ chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las ni mngon par mos par gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs
49a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi gsung la mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar bdagang / sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bslab par dka'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad
49a4(phal chen): bzang po rnam par dag pa ni mngon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ 
49a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshan cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par
49a6(phal chen): dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa bskyed de rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar gzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal
49a7(phal chen): ba'adzam gling gi rdul sha du pra ba snyed cig tu/ yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa las spyod pa mi dran na gnyis kyi gnyis 'dru ba lta ci smos// rigs kyi dbu der sa nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes
49a8(phal chen): su la 'ang / khong khro ba'i sems gcig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can mnyes pa gzhan lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad dbadag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
49a9(phal chen): gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na de ma yin po'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gis byas te/ mngon par chags pa lta ci smos/ shi 'phro ba dang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe'ang sems rmongs pa 'am 'du shes sna
49b1(phal chen): tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du ma dran na/ legs par bsams shani lA ci smas/ bskal pa de snyed gcig tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs
49b2(phal chen): pa yang brjod du mi dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprin yang dag pa 'dzid kyang / chung ngur ming du
49b3(phal chen): bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge gcig kyang brjod par ma dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig
49b4(phal chen): mthung mthung yang chung ngu na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos 'ag rgyas rnams la tshig 'ga' ma bsams la ma rtogs par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de steng gcig gi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang
49b5(phal chen): chung ngur 'jig rten rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ de bzhin gshegs
49b6(phal chen): pade snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang ji ltar yongs su bu lngas/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma rtogs pa'i chung ngu na/ rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyis tshig dang yi ge mgo bor mi dran no// de nas
49b7(phal chen): bar bzung ba tsam tshun cad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang sAl chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ sgom lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par
49b8(phal chen): dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun cad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las/ byang chub sems dpa'i
49b9(phal chen): spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang / kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun cad du/ sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag pa
50a1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma bskul ba de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs pa mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun bcad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
50a2(phal chen): ba gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs mi dran no// rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung zab tshun bcad bskal pa 'dzam bu gling gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed cig lon yang tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang the tsom bskyed pa
50a3(phal chen): 'am gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes skyed du mi dran no// 
50a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de phyin kho bo ni de phyin bcad du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ma dral lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo// yang dag pa'i
50a5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
50a6(phal chen): tshul thos pa dang bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang mi bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa ma bral lo/ 
50a7(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba las 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa dang ma
50a8(phal chen): bral lo// 'gro ba thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa'i dri ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thos
50a9(phal chen): pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad shes par bya ba'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / 
50b1(phal chen): mthal lo// rigs kyi bu kho mas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i slothub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spong po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal bas pa skyo ba'i rkyen gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'dris
50b2(phal chen): rnams par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpar byung pa ma ya'i dam la nyan pa'i 'dirnam par bye 'dang // gsungs kyi rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'dzing/ thobs par 'i zhes snang ba'i rnams
50b3(phal chen): kyi ga'i thams cad spang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par bye ba dang / che 'phrul byas ma gyis mi khyab pa dang / yad na rigs kyi bu khyod mdod su du ngalta bar 'dod/ rnas pa 'dzags ma 'jal la// den pa
50b4(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo bden de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgothub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi chos thams cad btsal zas pa skyo ba
50b5(phal chen): rgyan la srogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don dam yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur pa la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
50b6(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi ba'ang pa'i mdzod la sngags pa dang / ting de 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par lta ba dang / rnam par smad pa dang rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtags par byas ze/ 
50b7(phal chen): de ltar dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs pa mthag tu tshong dpon gyi nor ba rangs kyis phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ring brjod du med pa'i phrag bcu'i rdul shin du zla bskyed nam
50b8(phal chen): ba drug tu g.yos pa dang / bye dUr+ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa'i bye ba phrag brgya brgya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya
50b9(phal chen): bzhugs par mthong ste/ lo la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo // de yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye dUr+ya'i rang bzhid nga ngag
51a1(phal chen): yongs su dag cing sgrub pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od gser gyi dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa mnga'
51a2(phal chen): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba brgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi
51a3(phal chen): 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa sems can thams cad kyi lam du rnam par drag pa'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshang dpon gyi bu nor
51a4(phal chen): gzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ thos sam shes sam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo // thos so rig go// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
51a5(phal chen): spyod pa yid dam rten pa la bslab cing / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i
51a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang ba brjod pa mkhas pa'i ye shes legs par sos
51a7(phal chen): can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ na mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod par ltar gnas par spyod
51a8(phal chen): pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongasu smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing thams
51b1(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i kla'i du rgyu ba/ mthu dang ldan pa'i nya ba ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas/ srid pa'i tshulas 'byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon
51b2(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ chos kyi rgya mtshol rnam par rgyu ba/ lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi yul chen po rtul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsum gi gnas yongs su bkang ning rnam par rgyu ba nyi ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar sos
51b3(phal chen): can gyi sred pa'i chu dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'angam shin du bskam pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyis me tog ku mu tan me par kha dbye ba'i phyi
51b4(phal chen): ye shes kyi nam mkha' mngon par shes pa/ sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i nyug gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ byams mi byams dang mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa
51b5(phal chen): rlung ngamar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa/ dang / lta ba'i shing dang shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra nas gcod pa'i phyir/ chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba 'khor los sgyur ba ltar
51b6(phal chen): bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang / rkyen kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su b+ha'i phyir/ 'jig rten rnam par spyod pa de dag gis spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid
51b7(phal chen): kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na/ grong khyer bka' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun rgyu thams cad du 'gro zhes bya ba 'jug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i skyong ba la
51b8(phal chen): bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu gzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
52a1(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ste/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu ra nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon tu byas te/ dge bsnyen mi mi g.yo
52a2(phal chen): ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang bsgrubs pa dang / bshed pa dang brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang bzhag pa dang / rnam par bye
52a3(phal chen): ba dang smos pa dang / brgya chen po bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsams pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / sgom pa dang yongs su bsgom pa dang / 
52a4(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing / mthar kyis gnas nas gnas nas yul dang yul du brgyus ste/ rgyu zhing so song nas/ yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa
52a5(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol te nyi ma nub tu bya ba zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par nang du song ste/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i
52a6(phal chen): dbus zhig tu phyin nas/ srang gi sgom nas srang gi sgo dang / lam gi bzhi mdo nas lam gi bzhir mdor dang / grong phrag nas grong phrag tu kun du rgyu ba thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang / mtshan mo mi
52a7(phal chen): nyal tsam zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba yod de'i ri mo rtsa dang / gel ba dang sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar skyes pas/ brgyan pa 'od chen po dang ldan pa la nyi ma
52a8(phal chen): shar ba lta bu gnas pa mthong ngo // des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/ 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gang nyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar
52a9(phal chen): gyur pa lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu mong pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rigan du mod pa de la 'dzegs te/ ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na der phyin pa dang rgyang yang ring po zhig nas kun du rgyu
52b1(phal chen): rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin du 'bar ba zhig tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/ 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong
52b2(phal chen): des de'i drung du byon te/ rkang pa gnyis la bsdu bos phyag 'tshal te/ de la ldan 'argya stong 'du mar g.yas phyogs su bskur ba byas te/ mthun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
52b3(phal chen): pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba'i dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni
52b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa bdag gis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
52b5(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho
52b6(phal chen): bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa kyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas
52b7(phal chen): par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings kun gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig
52b8(phal chen): rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho'i sgo thams cad dang / sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang / 
52b9(phal chen): skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang / dbyibs dang chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i skye ba kun du brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs
53a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste/ lha'i lam gyi rgyud gtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs
53a2(phal chen): pa dang / lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi lam gi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can
53a3(phal chen): dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gartogs pa dang / byol song gyi lam skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin
53a4(phal chen): ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas pa nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs
53a5(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la bzod rgyus tha dad pa thams cad ldan pa'i gzugs snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi gzo rnams bslabs shing don byed do// sems can la la
53a6(phal chen): la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes stabs pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyis don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye
53a7(phal chen): shes kyi sgo smra ba'i yongs su skyed pas/ pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar rten cing yongs su bskyed pas byang chub sems dang
53a8(phal chen): sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ 
53a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par thams cad du yang dag par rjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ ngan du spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa dang mthun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyud
53b1(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa yongasasu bskyon pas skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni/ gdon mi za bar
53b2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas/ dga' ba chen po skyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang sku la mngon par mes
53b3(phal chen): pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di
53b4(phal chen): lta ste/ mi bzlog shing lhun gyis grub pa dang rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas su sku mthob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
53b5(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ tshus zil gyis non la/ phas zil gyis mi gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ 
53b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa de'i gzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mang
53b7(phal chen): thams cad dang / grong 'tshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i grong rdal thams cad dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad dug/ rnam par ji ltar tshogs
53b8(phal chen): shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang / mthun pa'i lus
53b9(phal chen): kyi chu zhed dang / dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gas nges so bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/ gzhan tu na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan tu byed pa ni meng pa
54a1(phal chen): 'ang ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu gling 'di ni zhags pa 'thub par lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du yang sos
54a2(phal chen): can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'dzin sems can gyi don
54a3(phal chen): byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi de grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang / yul khams dang / rgyal po'i phreng 'khor thams cad na yang sems can gyi don byed do// 'dzam bu gling na ji lta ba bzhin
54a4(phal chen): tu gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang de bzhin du stang gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can
54a5(phal chen): gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtags pa thams cad dang / sems
54a6(phal chen): can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho gnas thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs su bya
54a7(phal chen): ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi skyed pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang thabs sna tshogs dang tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna
54a8(phal chen): tshogs dang / 'phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang
54a9(phal chen): tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi ba rjes su song ba 'di shes par
54b1(phal chen): zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su tha dad mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang thob pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid
54b2(phal chen): pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gyi lus la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis lhan dga' ba zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa/ 'gro ba zas
54b3(phal chen): cad kyi rigs dang rgyud dang / cher skye ba rab tu ston pa bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la thegs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob po// 
54b4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed do// gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ 'dus gsum gi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang / ldan pas snang bas byas
54b5(phal chen): ba'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dag gas spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ 
54b6(phal chen): song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod te/ de nas sros tshong gi cheng dpon longs spyod ud pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan tu song la ji ltar byang
54b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslabs par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba bris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor gzangs kyis/ kun du brgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang
54b8(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// kun du rgyu thams cad 'gro ba la lan brgya phrag tu mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ kun du brgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song / 
54b9(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la ni mi lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi dga'
55a1(phal chen): pa thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang dbang
55a2(phal chen): phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/ sems can thamams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs
55a3(phal chen): su dag par bya ba la blta ba mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim 'gror bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud
55a4(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad lta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi don du nan tan du bya ba las mnyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang / bskal
55a5(phal chen): pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor
55a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad bzud pa la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i
55a7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag pas bzungs pa'i sa mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams
55a8(phal chen): cad lta ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas
55a9(phal chen): su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing / mthar kyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ spos tshong gi cheng dpon yongs su spyod pa ud pa la yongs su rmed cing tshal tshol ba las/ mthong nas
55b1(phal chen): spos mchong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la gang na ba der phyin te/ drung du song nas/ spos chang gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs
55b2(phal chen): spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag
55b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongasu
55b4(phal chen): grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal ba'i bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par yang
55b5(phal chen): bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang
55b6(phal chen): dga'/ bsgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtor bar yang dga'/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
55b7(phal chen): dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi na/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad
55b8(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bar ma 'tshal to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyed kyis na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so logs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sres
55b9(phal chen): thams cad shes te/ spos sbyor ba thams cad dang / gdug spos thams cad dang gdug spos sbyor ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thos
56a1(phal chen): cad dang / spos dang byug pa dang phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma ya ni dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
56a2(phal chen): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so// nad gso ba'i spos dang yid mi bde ba gsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang nyon pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs
56a3(phal chen): pa zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad la skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad sel ba'i
56a4(phal chen): spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas bskyed pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad
56a5(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba dag skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa dang / yongs
56a6(phal chen): su spang ba dang rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang mthu dang / las dang rgyud dang yang shes rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na spos glang po che'i snying po zhes bya ba klu yongs su
56a7(phal chen): 'khrug pa'i byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bras bu tsam gyis kyang yul khams thams cad spos kyi dra ba shin du sdug pas kun nas khebs pas gyur te/ zhag bdun spos chus rgyun shin du phra bas
56a8(phal chen): char mngon par 'bab po// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam gos la spos chus rgyan de dag gsi 'bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog tu lugapas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang
56a9(phal chen): sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas pa gang gas sras kyi sprin gyi dra ba la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / zhag bdun tu dga' ba dang mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ 
56a10(phal chen): sus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang tu 'bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi ladog lnga bus rnam par rgyad par gnas pa/ 
56b1(phal chen): 'dus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus la yang khams mkhrugs par las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod pa las bya ba las gyur pa'i mang
56b2(phal chen): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do// sems kyi sdug bsngal dang yid kyi mi bde ba yang mi 'thung ngo // 'jigs pa 'am sdang ba 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am yid mkhrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu
56b3(phal chen): ste de dag thams cad kyang dag 'dun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/ gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba ba skyes pa rnams
56b4(phal chen): la bdag bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ji nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i mas de ltar chos ston te/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rim la ya las byung ba'i tsan tanas
56b5(phal chen): stengs dpa pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsha mtha' nas byung ba'i spos gzhan gis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nges rnga'am dung la skus
56b6(phal chen): na de'i sras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngos nas byung ba'i a ka ru nag po pang po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gzhig gi dris kyang 'dzam bu
56b7(phal chen): gling thams cad rgyas par 'gang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tsher ba de dag thams cad sdi kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las byung
56b8(phal chen): ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhe bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshur na sems can de dag 'od chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// kho bo ni de dag la ni ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin
56b9(phal chen): thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ldan to// rigs kyi bu min po'i 'jig rten nas byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa brgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i long spyod kyi 'o du byung ste/ des gdugs mthag
57a1(phal chen): tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpung gyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i yang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas byung ba'i spos kyi rnam par byed pa zhes bya ba yod de
57a2(phal chen): des gdugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa dag pa'i mdzad zhes bya ba yod de/ des gtugs ma thag tu mas
57a3(phal chen): mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lha'i rgyal po rab mche ma'i drung du dong ngo // de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas chos kyi gtamo bya'o// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas pa na spos kyi rnam pa si du ba
57a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gas thog pa med pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ chos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa gang zhing
57a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan pa sna tshogs dang bu'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab po// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas ni/ spos kyi rnam pa yid
57a6(phal chen): 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su gdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char gsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho byos ni sros bsgyur de
57a7(phal chen): shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa/ 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gi rgyud thams cad
57a8(phal chen): las shin du 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul tsam bslabs pa med par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
57b1(phal chen): dag pa/ thog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul du ldan pa/ kun gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyong
57b2(phal chen): pa shes pa 'am/ rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho
57b3(phal chen): phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na gnyen pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i drung du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba
57b4(phal chen): ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gi bu nor ba rangs kyis spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos tshong dpon gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pa la
57b5(phal chen): la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i drung nas seng ngo // de nas tshong dpon gi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa rtsegs
57b6(phal chen): pa'i 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rtul yod pa dang / lam rtul med pa dang / lam bde dang lam mi bde ba deng / lam dog pa dang lam gyegs
57b7(phal chen): med pa dang / lam 'khrug pa dang lam 'khrug pa med pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa de bltas nas 'di snyam du sems so// 'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen ti'i drung du 'gro ba 'ang na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi
57b8(phal chen): nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa'i nani tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dang mthon dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par
57b9(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul shin tu rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdang du ma dang / cher ma dang gyo mo dang / gseg ma bsal ba dang
58a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la gzhol bar byed pa/ dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med pa'i bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni chos thams cad kyi
58a2(phal chen): 'byung gnas so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so// zhes de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas/ spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer ba khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin
58a3(phal chen): nas mnyan pa dpa' bo yos su rmeng bcing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi rgya mtsho chen po zhig gi ngogs nas mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong dpon pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya phrag stong du ma rtam
58a4(phal chen): sna tshogs nyan par 'dod par sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing rgya mtsho'i rta ma yong su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon btan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas mnyam pa dpa' bo gang na
58a5(phal chen): ba der song ste/ phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya phrag stong tu mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug
58a6(phal chen): ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab
58a7(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / brjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar
58a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang bdag la bka' bstsal tu gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
58a9(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su
58b1(phal chen): 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ti
