58b2(phal chen): de 'dzin gyi sgo dang / rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang/ byang chub sems da ba'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa
58b3(phal chen): med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rgyud dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang tshul gyi lam 'byung ba
58b4(phal chen): dang rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi tshogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phyi mi'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho 'jug pa'i lam
58b5(phal chen): 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'gyur ba'i rgyu dri ba legaso legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i rigs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan
58b6(phal chen): yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du bka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi zang
58b7(phal chen): zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya ba'o// chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o// de dag la bsod nams kyis tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar
58b8(phal chen): bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skabs yongs su sbrel bar bya'o// byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i spobs nye bar rtun par bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug
58b9(phal chen): bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu brtan par bya'o// sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o// yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o// 
59a1(phal chen): 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bslang par bya'o// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la'ang 'di
59a2(phal chen): ngag bzud par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid la bya ba la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di nas gnas so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa
59a3(phal chen): pa dang / bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu
59a4(phal chen): shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu 'khrug po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang srin po'i 'jigs pa thams
59a5(phal chen): cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung ba'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung ba'i bar chad thams cad rnam par zhi bar bya bar yang rab tu shes ste/ glong yod par shes pa thams cad glong thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya
59a6(phal chen): ba dang / bkrol bar dang / dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spang ba dang / chu'i kha dog tha dad pa rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so// nyi ma dang gza' skar kyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang skad
59a7(phal chen): tsam dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig kyang rab tu shes so// phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru gzur ba dang gru phul ba dang / rlung brngo
59a8(phal chen): ba dang rlung bskyed pa dang / gru zur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru rtod pa dang gru btang ba yang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed
59a9(phal chen): de tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos/ lam bde zhi nye zhor mi 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas
59b1(phal chen): de dag rin po che'i thams cad kyis tshogs te/ phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu glang du 'gyed 'byed kyang / rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang 'bub pa 'am nye zher gyur pa ma myong ste
59b2(phal chen): sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang / mkhor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor gyur pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bral bar
59b3(phal chen): 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum tu 'gyur ro// srid pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes
59b4(phal chen): snang ba 'ang rab tu theng po// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir
59b5(phal chen): yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par
59b6(phal chen): 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mche tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'gre ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji ltar
59b7(phal chen): bzhin du'ang / gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs
59b8(phal chen): shes bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi
59b9(phal chen): chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ ches rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gra zhi las rnam par rgyu ba 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad du bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa thams cad
60a1(phal chen): mkhyen pa 'i ye nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu srub pa/ dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha da pa/ rnam par spyod pa 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs
60a2(phal chen): su smin par bya ba'i dmigs pa shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i bres las mi 'da' ba de dag gi skyed pa 'am yon tan brjod pa chus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di na grong khyer dga'
60a3(phal chen): sa bya ba yod de/ de na chang dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gas/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' sred pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ 
60a4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang ltas nas/ 
60a5(phal chen): gdong mchims bkang ste du zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bas mi ngoms bzhin tu mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song // // shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya
60a6(phal chen): ba las sdong pos rgyan pa/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas tshong dpan gyi bu nor bzangs byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par bgang bI sos
60a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po rlan kyis mngon par rlan pa'i rgyud can/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyan shin tu bsags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang mun pa dang dri ma dang 'dam thams cad dang
60a8(phal chen): bral ba chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi
60a9(phal chen): shags pa'i brtson 'grus rten pa'i mthu bsngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byang bar rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi mi'i 'od zer snang
60b1(phal chen): ngas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus par gsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bu blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/ chos kyi dbyings
60b2(phal chen): thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon tu gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa
60b3(phal chen): grong khyer dga'i ba'i 'phreng ba gang ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba'i dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs kyi 'dab gcig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal
60b4(phal chen): mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de nang na/ khyim bdag stong phrag tu ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad nga yang dag par gzhom pa
60b5(phal chen): dang yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shan du bshigs pa dang / srid pa'i mching ba thams cad bcad par bya ba
60b6(phal chen): dang lta ba'i dam pa thams cad kyi ske glegs gcag pa dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / ne mo nur gyi rab ra'i thams cad rnam par gsal ba dang / g.yo spu'i rnyog pa thams cad shani du gtang ba dang / pra dog dang
60b7(phal chen): ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang sems can kyi mtsho shin tu bsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos
60b8(phal chen): bla bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sa yongs su bskyed pa
60b9(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cing / byang chub semams dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi gtam byed cing / 'di lta ste byang chub tu sems
61a1(phal chen): bskyed pa la mngon mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjes chad chad tu bstan nas/ tshong dpon gyi rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang
61a2(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs zhes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyong
61a3(phal chen): pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i don la mngon
61a4(phal chen): du mos par 'gyur bar dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang ba dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung
61a5(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa dang / bskal pa thams cad tu gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
61a6(phal chen): spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs yang dag par mnod pa dang / de bzhin
61a7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon brgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor gzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// 
61a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
61a9(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su spang ba ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas
61b1(phal chen): shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mche ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gi lha'i 'jig rten na thams cad dang / 
61b2(phal chen): 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad
61b3(phal chen): dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod kyi gnas thams cad
61b4(phal chen): dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yid dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / 
61b5(phal chen): yad dgas kyi 'a gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / na mkha'
61b6(phal chen): ljang gi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' ljang gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lho phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 
61b7(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / me'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang rgyal po'i pho brang mkhor dang / 
61b8(phal chen): 'dod pa'i khams su rtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ston to// chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go/ rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa ni rnam par bzlog go// mkhrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed
61b9(phal chen): g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par zlog go/ shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel te/ bcings pa thams cad ni yongs su gcad do// brtson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dra'o// 
62a1(phal chen): 'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog cig/ mi dge ba'i lus kyi rgyun 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// sreg gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par
62a2(phal chen): g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang / tshig khyal pa dang / chags sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go/ mi bya ba thams cad ni byed
62a3(phal chen): tu mi 'jug go/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byed du 'jug go// sems can ni bzo thams cad la bslab tu 'dzud do// 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 
62a4(phal chen): zhags pa thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing snyan
62a5(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang / ston to// rnam par 'god do// rab tu bskul bar byed do// brjod do de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi ra bar du gzugs kyi khams
62a6(phal chen): kyi lha thams cad zil gyis gnan te chos ston to// steng gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig rgya
62a7(phal chen): stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul sha ni phra ba bsnyed dag tu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
62a8(phal chen): ston to// sems can dmyal ba yang ston to// sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba dang sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde yang ston to// byol so gi skye gnas kyang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyi
62a9(phal chen): gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'i lam kyi lam tu 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to// gshin rje'i
62b1(phal chen): 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston te// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' ba
62b2(phal chen): spyod pa dang / long spyod kyang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi 'de ba dang / sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar
62b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to// 'jig rten gyi kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten nas byung ba yang ston te/ de yang 'di
62b4(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa' dang / 'khor ba'i skyon yang dag par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par rjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud mgo 'khor
62b5(phal chen): ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / ldeg pa'i bde ba dang / 
62b6(phal chen): sdug bsngal thams cad smras pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas med pa mngon par bston pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i
62b7(phal chen): 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin du brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba rnam par dag
62b8(phal chen): ba'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad nas/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes
62b9(phal chen): bzhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ kun du lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa/ tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin du gzhol
63a1(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ tus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gas dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa'o// 
63a2(phal chen): sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yengs shing sra ba la yang du 'ong ba dang ldan
63a3(phal chen): pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba'i kho dag dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang ldan pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mi
63a4(phal chen): gnyis pa'i spyod pa lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad tu rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yulu dpag tu med
63a5(phal chen): ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' dang / grong khyer ka li ka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ 
63a6(phal chen): de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar na na tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong
63a7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshong dpon rgyal dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon
63a8(phal chen): rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon bu nor bzangs mthar kyis shu ma phyi ma'i grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal gang na der song ste/ phyin nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems
63a9(phal chen): can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang tu song ba de dang der/ rogs po brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo ste brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang lam gyi gzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo // skyes pa brgya phrag tu ma dang
63b1(phal chen): bud med brgya phrag tu ma dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu mo re re dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/ grong ka ling kwa'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa'i nyi ma'i 'dog na/ sems
63b2(phal chen): can chad med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes ches bston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi dubu ron bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu bstsal te bltas na/ bza' shing gir ba de na shing zla ba
63b3(phal chen): shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyigs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dag can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun du dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par mang po dang lo ma'i
63b4(phal chen): shing yongs su 'bebs pa zhes bya la 'dug gis/ rnam pa dang dbyibs su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas khyab pa/ bye dUr+ya bsngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi
63b5(phal chen): shing me tog gi mdzod zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dang dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi bzang pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i 'o brang
63b6(phal chen): gi brgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba/ sus kyang mi shigs pa blta bu dang / shing thog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu tshogs zhes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa rtag tu shing tog phun sum
63b7(phal chen): chags par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod zhes bya ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang se ma nga dang / rgyan rin po
63b8(phal chen): che'i yid ban ni gi rgyal po'i mdzod dang / nas byung ba'i ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ ri chen po'i kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi
63b9(phal chen): gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing byang bas shin du brgyan pa mang pos dang rol mo'i shing dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa
64a1(phal chen): mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu zhami pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs pa thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngang 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong // 
64a2(phal chen): mtshe'u dang lu ma dang / lte ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus brtsigs pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them slas btsugs pa/ rani po che'i sna tshogs kyi khri'i 'phang dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan
64a3(phal chen): gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba/ gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bya dUr+ya bsngon po las legs par blangs pa 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi phye ma bdal pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha rdzas
64a4(phal chen): kyi dri zhim po yid du 'ong ba tsam gis yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun d+ha ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi gsung dang ldan pa'i chu klung kun nas g.yog
64a5(phal chen): pabya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yang du 'ong ba dang ldan pa sgra snyan pa yad du brjod pas gang ba lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par kye bas yongs su
64a6(phal chen): bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa sha'i sna tshogs de dag gi drung du thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa tu
64a7(phal chen): mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'bral bar gting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang gdugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis gdugs pa dang / lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par
64a8(phal chen): dbyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re ba kyi ba rin po che sna tshogs dang / 'dzam bu krung gi gser gau dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa rin po che'i dra bas dril bu yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ mang pos rgyan
64a9(phal chen): pa 'khor du lha rdzas rin po che'i bstan brgya stong phrag tu ma bta zhing bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che'i pad mo'i snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni
64b1(phal chen): seng ge'i khri nor du ri po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mes snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khwa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyis pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // 
64b2(phal chen): la lar ni seng ge khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i seng ge khri bya ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po byas pa
64b3(phal chen): bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par sna ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal po dbang po
64b4(phal chen): 'i rdo rje pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng
64b5(phal chen): ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po'i mdog dkar po'i pad mos sdong po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen
64b6(phal chen): po ltar rin po che'i glang gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo // byi dUr+ya ba ston pa'i dam pas sbas te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs ka tsa la 'da' ltar reg na bde ma dang 'jam yang gam pa zor ring
64b7(phal chen): bteg pa'i tshe mthon dman med pa rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun du bkram pa/ rang dur dang / rma bya dang khrung khrung dang / ku na la dang ka la bying ka dang / ki ki
64b8(phal chen): la dang / 'ji ban 'jib ka s+tha snyan la tsang yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs par mdzes par brgyan pa'i rin po rje
64b9(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi pang mo'i sprin gi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi bzad pa'i char rgyun du 'bab pa 'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa margyan
65a1(phal chen): par bkod pa'i nang nas spos kyi rgyal po'i gdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu mthul zhing zhim pa lha'i mdun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i
65a2(phal chen): rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun du bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / lnga ldi kun nas bres pa rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam pa bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar
65a3(phal chen): bas kun nas bkris pa rol mo'i shing dang rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pa sa/ yad du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i lha'i rgyal po'i lnga
65a4(phal chen): mo dpe tshul bzhin du bzang ba rnams kyis klu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yad du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid gzhan gi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar
65a5(phal chen): kha dog dang mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas lta na btang ba mi bral ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ brgya stong grangs pa med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i pho brang ltar
65a6(phal chen): blta na bzang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gzugs shin tu legs par rnam par bsgreng zhing / bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa dbang po'i 'jig rten/ 
65a7(phal chen): ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba'i chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i
65a8(phal chen): 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang byin gyis rlabs che zhing bsam gis mi khyab pas// 
65a9(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams grangs med pa'i gas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs kyis de ltar yon tan tshad med
65b1(phal chen): bsam gis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bzang shing gi ra ba'i brgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su 'grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa
65b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rgyu mthun bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin
65b3(phal chen): sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas rgyu mthun pa'i stobs dang
65b4(phal chen): shugs kyis byung ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang mthun mong ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs
65b5(phal chen): pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ltar med pa mthong ste/ shang sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri rin po che de dag la'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ lus shin tu mdzes pa srung
65b6(phal chen): lam zhi ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba shan tu dben pa/ dbang po thul pa glang po ltar thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing stsal la/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar
65b7(phal chen): 'dod pa thams cad grub pa/ pad me la chu ma chags pa ltar/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang skyi g.ya' ba med pa/ me 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po la
65b8(phal chen): mi bslus bya/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du'ang ba'i spos kyi rgyal po lhur 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa sman gi rgyal po lta na
65b9(phal chen): bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ chu lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa tshangs
66a1(phal chen): pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gAti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po che nor bu rin po che chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur
66a2(phal chen): ba'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/ zhing bshan pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan/ de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khor ba
66a3(phal chen): mthong ste/ 'khor gyi bstan la le la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing // dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas
66a4(phal chen): chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi bzad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba ya dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 1'khor gi bstan la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba'i la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su
66a5(phal chen): rtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bsnyon pa mthong ngo // 
66a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur la sogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'dir 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng gi rnam par sgyings
66a7(phal chen): pas kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'
66a8(phal chen): la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo thams cad dag pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par
66a9(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma
66b1(phal chen): seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi klong zhes bya ba yang dag par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi san la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mche ma la sogs pa lnga'i bu mo 'khor dang
66b2(phal chen): bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rgya byin la sngags
66b3(phal chen): pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma steng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sde skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par ston
66b4(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gangs can mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa
66b5(phal chen): la sogs pa klu'i bu me 'khor dang bcas pa klu'i byis pa'i 'khar dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge bslong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi
66b6(phal chen): rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal sos po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor
66b7(phal chen): dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzad ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la
66b8(phal chen): la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung ba la sogs pa drir mang po dri za'i bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos sgo dga' ba mi
66b9(phal chen): zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bston pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la le la ni lha ma yid kyi dbang po sgra can la sogs pa lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi byis
67a1(phal chen): pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnams par khasgyings pas chos kyi sgo dbyings zhes byed pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par
67a2(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni nam mkha' ldang gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa nam mkha' lngang gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gi byis pI
67a3(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mkhod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la
67a4(phal chen): la la ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdod pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings
67a5(phal chen): pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lho phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa ste phye chen po'i bu mo dang / 
67a6(phal chen): lto phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan
67a7(phal chen): la la la ni skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo brgya steng mang po ma khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo khyad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor
67a8(phal chen): gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog stong po rgyal po la sogs pa srin po'i rgya dbang po sran pa'i bu mo dang / srin po'i byis pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma
67a9(phal chen): seng ge rnams par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi sgo theg pa la mos pa rnams la 'khod cing / dge
67b1(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni sangs rgya sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la
67b2(phal chen): mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnams par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgra sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po 'ang zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can
67b3(phal chen): theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun du sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang
67b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnams par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spe lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par mthong ngo // 'khor
67b5(phal chen): gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yang dag par
67b6(phal chen): bstand pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cang / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan
67b7(phal chen): ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi la gnas pa rnams la 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad
67b8(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bston pa rnams mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
67b9(phal chen): bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bsten pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams mdzad 'khod cing // 
68a1(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas
68a2(phal chen): pa rnams mkhod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting 'dzin gyi sgo kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad
68a3(phal chen): pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnams par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin du rnam par che'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi
68a4(phal chen): stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa na rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba
68a5(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sde sgrib
68a6(phal chen): pa med pa'i dam dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
68a7(phal chen): chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can kyi lam gyi
68a8(phal chen): rgyud ci snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba snod tu gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing / 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa bsam pa tha dad pa'i mos pa
68a9(phal chen): ma mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin du gzhol bar gyur pa tha dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ji nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bla na med pa yang gdagra
68b1(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas des kun tu blta ba'i btang ba snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs
68b2(phal chen): ba dang sangs rgyas thams cad shin du bstan pa la sogs pa dang / chos dbyings tha dad pa la sogs pa dang / bsgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad
68b3(phal chen): kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par du yod pa'i brgyan la sogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying be la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sregs
68b4(phal chen): ba dang / sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par bslabs pa'i snying pa la sogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa gnon pa'i phyir te/ bza'i shing gi rang
68b5(phal chen): nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge rtswa seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lta ba dang / ches nyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / dge slong ma seng ge
68b6(phal chen): rnam par bsgrangs pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la bshed shan du bkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa shag stag go// / 
68b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong ma ser ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / nags tshal phun sum chags pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun suM tshogs pa dang
68b8(phal chen): 'chags phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyad phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
68b9(phal chen): rdzu 'phral dang rnam par 'phral pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas chos kyi sprin kyi char chen pos
69a1(phal chen): sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis/ da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya
69a2(phal chen): stong du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mo la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par rabasgyings pas bza' shing gi ra ba dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas/ 
69a3(phal chen): de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal me sbyar ba nas
69a4(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / 
69a5(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
69a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i la bAgyi byA dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa
69a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba thob po// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus
69a8(phal chen): gsum tu 'byung ba'i brgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no// smras pa 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khe mes ye shes
69a9(phal chen): snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang / yongs su bsgrub pa'i tshe chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin skyes te/ de ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyis
69b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa/ thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
69b2(phal chen): da phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha'
69b3(phal chen): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 
69b4(phal chen): phreng ba'i spos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i spos yongs su 'dzin pa dang phye ma'i spos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi spyani yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi
69b5(phal chen): swa ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi sgrani yongasu
69b6(phal chen): 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sgrani yang su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sgra ni yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gi rgyan gyi smani yongasu 'dzin pa dang / mchod par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
69b7(phal chen): 'gro po dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa rnga ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin tu yum gi skur gsheganas pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun
69b8(phal chen): mo'i mkhor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la zhugs pa dang / 
69b9(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin tu lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mau dang mi ma yin pa
70a1(phal chen): gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yong su tshim par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las pa'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyis lus
70a2(phal chen): rnam pa de lta bu bdag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o// sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes pa
70a3(phal chen): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
70a4(phal chen): gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la blta yang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed la rlom sems kyang mi byed do// 'gro bar bya
70a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi skad brgya mtsho'ang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ rlom sems su byed pa med pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongasu shes pas// 
70a6(phal chen): rlom semasu byed pa'ang med do// de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu 'dzin kyang chos kyi rang bzhin khong tu chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi
70a7(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs kyang chos nyid bsgyu ma'i rang bzhini khong du chud pas rlom semasu byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongasu
70a8(phal chen): bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa la zhugs pa// chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang / skyil mo bkrung gcig gis chos kyi
70a9(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi
70b1(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'thung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sku'i nyig ma gcig gis skabs shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi baspu'i bu gar 'jig rten gi khams brjod
70b2(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjed du med pa'i 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongasu ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par mdzad pa/ 
70b3(phal chen): skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khor ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon ter brjod par chus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod
70b4(phal chen): bka' ba dang / grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ma ldan lha'i bshen gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan tu song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
70b5(phal chen): pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong ma seng
70b6(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung du nas song ngo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
70b7(phal chen): shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bya de la ni/ sems chos nyid rang bzhin gi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta sems can thams cad
70b8(phal chen): kyi skad rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul 'di ni shin tu rgya che bar byed snying
70b9(phal chen): rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar gton/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings
71a1(phal chen): rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjesu ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'ong do ni shin du gsal bar byed/ chos thams
71a2(phal chen): cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs de ni mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems depa'i las dang dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas
71a3(phal chen): brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthar kyis yul bgrod bka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su 'tshal
71a4(phal chen): tshol ba dang // bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ ye shes kyi spyod yul gi tshul lam mkhas pa'i khyim pa'i mi brjed pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems/ te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing
71a5(phal chen): dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'phrul pa med cing de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la/ de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam tu lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing / de ltar mtshan mar
71a6(phal chen): mi 'dzin la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yang ba mig dang ldan te/ yid la brel ba med cing bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mche ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma
71a7(phal chen): lha'i shes gnyen mas gci zhig tu/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de sems phyin tshe log dang ldan yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag la ni ri mug cing gtsang ma'i 'du shes yongs su chud med de
71a8(phal chen): 'di la bu dag ni 'dad pas mkhol kyang ma sring de// 'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa med de/ 'di la bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la skyed kyang ba sring do// 'di lta bung dag 'dong ba'i 'dab tu byung ba
71a9(phal chen): yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med do// mi gos pa med kyang mi srid do snyam mo// gang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing/ 
71b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces mdzer te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyed bcom pa ma'i lha'i bshes gnyen la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ 
71b2(phal chen): legs so legs so khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smin pa'o// khyed ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu
71b3(phal chen): dbyung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa'o// rigs kyi bu der bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs
71b4(phal chen): shog na rang gi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshig de thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma khyim gang na
71b5(phal chen): ba der phyin nas de'i khyim che zhing yengs la rin po che'i rab rib ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad mo dang / 
71b6(phal chen): ud pa la dang / ka me tog ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka sa chus yongasu khyebs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma gdal pa/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dre ba'i chu dri zhim pas gang
71b7(phal chen): ba rin po che'i sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par dkrigs shing ba gam dang
71b8(phal chen): rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam gyi seng ge'i thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis
71b9(phal chen): brgyan pa/ rin po che'i bye dUr+ya sbas pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim pa thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas gdu gags shang bsangs pa/ a ka ru nag po mchog gi gdugs spos kyis dri zhim par gdugs
72a1(phal chen): pa spos kyi byug par 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi yan ka lan kan gyis 'artsig nges kun nas bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ge dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu sbas
72a2(phal chen): pas kun nas bkab pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyed cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid tu 'ong bzhing bstan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun b+hu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan
72a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi brgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che'i bye du rgya'i sdong po dang / rdo rje dang man shel
72a4(phal chen): la spogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi bzad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen pa ma gzugs
72a5(phal chen): mdzes shing lta na stug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dog dam pa rgyas dang ldan pa/ gser gi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ skra mthon mthong du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag nyid lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub
72a6(phal chen): pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyibs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad
72a7(phal chen): kyi sgra skad kyi tshul mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i zhing yid tu 'ong ba'i dbyangs can rnam par thar pa'i ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo' dang gtsug lag thams cad la 'khas re bar
72a8(phal chen): 'byung ba/ chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lta ba ltab sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 
72a9(phal chen): rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i brgyan dang / lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin du 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa
72b1(phal chen): yadang bzhin gyi rgyal po'i gcod pan thogs pa/ rin po che'i bye dUr+ya'i phreng ba mdo gzungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i seng ge sna tshogs bka' ba mgul na thogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la bskal pa
72b2(phal chen): mthun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi bzad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag
72b3(phal chen): thams cad dang rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi brgyan de dag thams cad kyang / rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa lus bde ba dang / sim pa bskyed pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas
72b4(phal chen): bstsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun tu 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smraso// 
72b5(phal chen): 'phags ma bdag gas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te
72b6(phal chen): 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad de/ zhes bdag gis thos nas ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
72b7(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba 'phags ma bdag la bstan du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
72b8(phal chen): kho mo ni rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang / rnam par dag cing mes pa bzhin tu snang ba byed do// de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za
72b9(phal chen): dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag
73a1(phal chen): pas jil mos pa bzhin tu snang bar byed do// sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na yang / de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'ang
73a2(phal chen): chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston to// de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu
73a3(phal chen): thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu thob po// la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gis 'dod chag
73a4(phal chen): dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu thob po// la la ni ka lag nas gzung ba tsam gis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ 
73a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob po// la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur
73a6(phal chen): te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral ba snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob po// la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i
73a7(phal chen): rnam pa'i brgyan zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu thob po// la la ni glad pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pas kyi dgel ba rnam par 'thob pa zhes bya ba thob
73a8(phal chen): pal la ni mig mi tshugs pa tsam gas 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// la la ni pang du khyud pa tsam gri
73a9(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skud cing mi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu zab po// la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gis 'dod
73b1(phal chen): chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob po// de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed// 
73b2(phal chen): cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon tu gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu
73b3(phal chen): 'god do// smras pa 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrin las ni ci lta bu zhig brtsams/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i
73b4(phal chen): dus na shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
73b5(phal chen): lha dang mi rnams kyi bston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu thob par gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de gshegs pa shan du mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sku ngan
73b6(phal chen): nga rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas/ sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas yangs shanga'i rgya che la rin po che du ma las byas par yongasu grub par gyur
73b7(phal chen): te/ steng gi bar snang la yang rin po mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par rgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin chang
73b8(phal chen): med pa rgya che bas khyebs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te/ blo gros bza' mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo chu 'phrul gyis yang dag bskul nas khyim thab dang / lhan
73b9(phal chen): cig 'dod 'dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gi srad du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig gcig phul lo// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon pa 'gyur pa yang de
74a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham ring du na 'dug ste/ des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems
74a2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' phyin pa 'di ni shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan
74a3(phal chen): paye shes kyi yul thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjed pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
74a4(phal chen): khyim bdag nan khugs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri phad can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis de'i gan tu seng la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
74a5(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa la gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma
74a6(phal chen): lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskur ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom pa ma lnga'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ 
74a7(phal chen): grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim gang ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun tu 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces
74a8(phal chen): smras so// 'phags ma ni bdag gas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tu bya
74a9(phal chen): bam 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis zos nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
74b1(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zang pa thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems
74b2(phal chen): kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma rtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
74b3(phal chen): su mya ngan las pam 'das pa med do// yongs su mya ngan las pa mnga' ba med do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi sgo 'phang gi
74b4(phal chen): sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed pa 'byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi bzad pa'i brgyan zhes bya ba thob po// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la nyid la sems
74b5(phal chen): kyi skad cig gcig tu mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems kyi sked cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa tu ma rab tu 'thob pa/ smras pa 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ sbas pa rigs kyi
74b6(phal chen): bu kho bo'i ting nge 'dzin la bsnyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bsod bskyabs la sogs pa de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad dang // 
74b7(phal chen): gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor can dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang rdzogs mdzad dang / grags mchog dang / pad mo'i bla la sogs pa de bzhin
74b8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas mtshams brel pas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi ma chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la
74b9(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya'ang mthong la// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas sto dang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo // de bzhin tu sangs rgyas bye ba dang sangs rgyas bye ba
75a1(phal chen): phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba tung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams thams ca dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrags khrigs dang / 
75a2(phal chen): de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas bya gcig cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gling gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyang mthang
75a3(phal chen): de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyis rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs po dang po bskyed
75a4(phal chen): pa'i tshigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ thugs dang po bskyed pa'i thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'ang 'jug go smon lam rnam par dag pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la
75a5(phal chen): 'ang 'jug go// spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bslab pa la'ang 'jug go// 
75a6(phal chen): bzod pa rnyed pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par ma thob pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgyan la'ang
75a7(phal chen): 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// 'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang
75a8(phal chen): 'jug go// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa'ang 'jug go// 'khor gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang
75a9(phal chen): 'phrul la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin du gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te yang dag par 'dzin dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed// 
75b1(phal chen): blo gros kyis shin du rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ 
75b2(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig la// sangs rgyas brgya 'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
75b3(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs
75b4(phal chen): ba de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par rjes su dran pa te/ yang dag par 'dzin to dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gles kyis
75b5(phal chen): rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgyud de sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu
75b6(phal chen): brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa'i rdul gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
75b7(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshigs gcig nas gcig brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig
75b8(phal chen): du brgyud ba la'ang rgyun mi mchad pa dang / mi bzad pa dang dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang zhenon pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi
75b9(phal chen): shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par shes
76a1(phal chen): shing kho tu chud par byed do// rnam par snang ba la sogs pa/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gcig gnas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang
76a2(phal chen): mtha' dang shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas 'argya'ang mtha zhing shes te/ de'i 'ag ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
76a3(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul phra shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du'ang mthong ste/ nam na de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal blta bar dga' dri bzhin du mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
76a4(phal chen): bstan pa dang bstan pa mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang thos so// thos nas kyang 'dzin to// dran pas ra yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo glas
76a5(phal chen): kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyi sa snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems nyed pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyir
76a6(phal chen): pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes te rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi la byung ba/ 
76a7(phal chen): rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i bdag dang sems can dang sangs rgyas mi mnyam par spyod pa'i rang
76a8(phal chen): bzhin gis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi brgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod
76a9(phal chen): pa ches kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtog par byed pa'i ye shes yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gas spyod pa shes
76b1(phal chen): pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus reg na/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi brgyud 'di nyid na ri gu 'dzin zhes bya ba yang de de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ der
76b2(phal chen): gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar na na dan tu bya ba dris shog zhes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis sbas so// song shig na
76b3(phal chen): bzangs dpal gyi rgyal dpung zhig na/ mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod// rin chen rgyus byas shing ngang nags tshal me tog mang // bza' shing ra brjing dang chu bran 'bab par ldan// ri mchog de la rtan pa
76b4(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du nas par spyod// de gan song na nor bzangs khyod la mgon po'i// yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa bstan par byed// de nas tshang
76b5(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bas phyi bo 'tshal nas// khumi bdag nan/ khugs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
76b6(phal chen): te/ yang dang yang bltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // // shan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'o// / 
76b7(phal chen): bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes su sems shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de
76b8(phal chen): ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig
76b9(phal chen): tu brgyud pa'i mtshan ni khong du chud par byed do// rna bas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi rjes su 'brang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang de ni mthun par byed/ sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i brgyan
77a1(phal chen): de ni kho du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog mthu byung ba la de ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bsam gas
77a2(phal chen): mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar kyis ni gru 'dzan gang na ba der 'ongs nas ri gru 'dzin gi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongasu rmed cing tshol tshol ba
77a3(phal chen): las/ nu ba phyogs logs kyi ris sman ljongs mtsho dang mche'u dang / 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa bai dUr+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar bsngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i srang nags tshal chen po mthong nas
77a4(phal chen): 'dug pa zhig na rin po che rdo rje'i rdo sde gas shig la dkyil mo bkrung bcas te 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stegs la mkhod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas nA
77a5(phal chen): kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar sten pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston
77a6(phal chen): cang 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba bskyes nas/ dga' bas rgyas shing mig mi 'dzum pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas dge ba'i bshes
77a7(phal chen): gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi mkhrugs pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sngani thams
77a8(phal chen): cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i shin tu dka' bar sems pa/ 
77a9(phal chen): dge ba'i bzhes gnyid la spobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'thung zhing thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan par dge ba'i bshes gnyen las ye shes snang ba mi 'arang pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i
77b1(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshig sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge
77b2(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su bskyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan
77b3(phal chen): pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang ba der phyin te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzugs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas
77b4(phal chen): smras pa/ tshur shog dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gis mi khyab pa la bzhugs pa/ skyes pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis brtses shang skyabs med par gyur pa'i
77b5(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa 'jig rten tham sa cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ 
77b6(phal chen): snying rje chen pos byin gyis rlabs pas 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i blo gros can/ lta na kun du bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyang ba'i sems dang
77b7(phal chen): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu bzung bar mos pa dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs pas ngoms la mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs
77b8(phal chen): pa 'jam dpal gyi ye shes ma rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs thob par byas pa la mngon du bltas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ 
77b9(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin gyi char yang dag bzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bar dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa legs par spyod pa tshad med
78a1(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan tu bya'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon
78a2(phal chen): tu gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gi shugs gzhan la yongasu bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bI
78a3(phal chen): shugs yang dag par bzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa yang legs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
78a4(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun tu
78a5(phal chen): 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem sa bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
78a6(phal chen): skyed pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub
