235b8(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shini tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi khong du chud pa'i zhing rgyam
235b9(phal chen): thams cad la yang 'jug ste/ de dag tu'ang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dper 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rnam par
236a1(phal chen): par 'phrul pa rnams kyang mngon tu gyur par lta'o// de bzhi ni gshegs par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed do// de bzhini gshegs pa de dag kyang chos bston pa nyan to// chos la yang gnyer ba'i chos kyis/ 
236a2(phal chen): nan tan byed do// de nas lum pi na'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad
236a3(phal chen): du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras// 
236a4(phal chen): rim gro bskyed cing de la gang dri ba// de dag bdag la rgyal ba'i sras nyo// na cig/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul lta dga' zhi ba ste// rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshul/ gyis rnam par bstan// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab
236a5(phal chen): snyed kyi// sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab dran// bskal pa 'amang ni snga phyi mnyam zhes bya'o// de la rgyal ba bye ba brgya bcu byung / bskal pa dang por de bzhin gshegs byung ba// dbang phyug
236a6(phal chen): yon tan mi thub rgyal mtshan no// nags tshal dam pa gser mdog me tog tu// mgon po de 'khrungs bdag gis mthong bar gyur// mang du dri med bskyed pa'i 'od ces bya// de'i mam mkhas par bdag gyur te// 
236a7(phal chen): bltam ma thag tu gser mdog dam pa'i 'od// 'jig rten dbang po bdag gis pang du bzhag/ gang zag dam pa pang du bzhag 'tsho yang // de'i spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus te// bsam yas de la g.yas dang gan
236a8(phal chen): tu yang / bltas shing mthar brnyes mthong bar ma gyur to// mtshan rab bzang po de ni yongs su brgyan// dra med de sku blta na rab stug ste// rin chen gzugs 'dra bdag gis mthong gyur nas// dga' ba'i shugs drag mtshungs
236b1(phal chen): med rnam par 'phel// de'i yon tan dpag g.yas sems sems nas// kho mo'i bsod nams rgya mtsho dpag med 'phel// de'i rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho mthong gyur nas// rgya chen byang chub sems kyang skyes par gyur// 
236b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i legs pa rgya mtsho dga' smon nas// smon lam rgya mtsho bdag gsi rab tu bskyed// 'byam klas zhing rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs// ngan song lam rnams kun nas rnam par bzlog/ zhang rnams 'byam klas
236b3(phal chen): kun gyi bde gshegs rnams// ma byon bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang // sems can sdug pa rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir// smon lam rgya mtsho kho mo btab par gyur// mgon po de las bdag gis chos thos nas// rnam
236b4(phal chen): thar dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob// bskal pa zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// spyad pa spyod de de yang rnam par sbyangs// de la mgon po ji// snyed byung ba gyur pa// de dag ma lus bdag gis kyang mchod
236b5(phal chen): rnam thar rgya mtsho 'dri ni skyong byed cing // de dag bstan pa kho mas yongs su bzung // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi// stobs bcu mnga' ji snyed 'das byung ba// de dag chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos
236b6(phal chen): bzung / rnam thar dkyil 'khor 'di yang rab tu bsgoms// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phran dza snyed pa// rdul rtse 'byam klas kun la rnam par mthong // rdul phran ro re la yang rgya mtsho'o zhing // sngan chad rgyal bas
236b7(phal chen): sbyangs pa rab tu mthong // zhing rnams 'byam klas de dag kun tu yang // mgon po thugs rgyud gcig la bsam yas pa'i// rnam 'phrul yangs pa yongasu ston mdzad cing // nags tshal mchog tu mkhrungs
236b8(phal chen): gyur bdag gis mthong // rgyal ba la la zhing rnams la la na// byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya thugs dgongs shing // dga' ldan 'jig rten bzhugs pa yang // zhing rnams bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab po// zhang
237a1(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs su rnam 'phrul pa// shin tu yangs pa skye ba'ang bdag gis mthong // na chung dam pa'i tshogs kyi dbus bzhugs shing // mgon pa chos rnams ston pa'ang
237a2(phal chen): de bzhi ni mthong // zhing rnams bye ba'i ri ba snyed kyi// dpa' bo sems kyi skad cig re re la// mngon par byung zhing shing thung rgyal drung du gshegs pa dang // sangs rgyas spyod yul yangs pa ston pa mthong // 
237a3(phal chen): zhing gcig rtul la bsam gyis mi khyab par// yul rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag ston mdzad pas// 'gro rgyud sems can sdug bsngal dgrol mdzad cing // ma gcod rnam par 'tshang rgya bdags
237a4(phal chen): Namathong // rdul phran re re'i rtse la mi bzad pa'i// rang 'byung 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad cing // dbyangs rnams rgya mtsho mi zad sgrogs mdzad pa'i// chos sbyin rgya chen char 'bebs
237a5(phal chen): mdzad pa mthong // 'gro ba kun la rnam pa tu mar yang // skad/ cig re rer mya ngan 'das ston pa// zhing rnams bye ba'i rgyu la phran rab snyed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing gcig rdul las
237a6(phal chen): bdag gis mthong // rtul cig bltas kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // rgyal ba byung ba ji snyed kun kyang mthong // tshe rabs kun tu ltas mod khrag khrig gis// de dag mchod pa'i don du nye bar phyin// zheng
237a7(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// 'gro brgyud mi zad ji snyed yod pa yi// 'gro ba kun la mngon du kho mo ni// chos sprin yangs pa'i char yang rab tu 'bebs// rgyal sras kho mos bsam gyis mi
237a8(phal chen): khyab pa'i// rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di shes kyi// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// thams cad bstan par kho mo nus re bsnyen// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'
237a9(phal chen): rnam thar pa// bskal pa tshad med par ni dmigs pa thams cad tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di shes par zad na// kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi
237b1(phal chen): skad cig re re la bskal pa thams cad du zhugs pa'i mngal nas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i skye ba rab tu ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad// 
237b2(phal chen): mchod pa'i smon lam gi bsam pa yongs su bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba// sems can thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud kyi lam
237b3(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa la gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du/ pad mo'i nang na skye ba 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la mkhas pa// sems
237b4(phal chen): can thams cad gtul bar bya ba la mngon par mos shing / tsheskye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu ston pa/ zhing 'byam klas da pa thams cad tu rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin yongs su ston pa// 
237b5(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi lam rgyud du skye ba dang / rigs su gzug sa brnyan 'byung bar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am// yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song ba rigs kyi bu grong khyer
237b6(phal chen): chen po ser skya'i gnas 'di na/ shag kya'i bu mo go pa zhes bya ba 'dug gas de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya
237b7(phal chen): ba dra si shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ lum pi na'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khar bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// lum pi ni'i
237b8(phal chen): nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ lum pi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi
237b9(phal chen): brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang po dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lum pi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ste/ 
238a1(phal chen): grong khyer chen po ser skya'i ga na ba der byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad de/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu ston
238a2(phal chen): kha de nyid bsgom pa dang / khong tu chud par bya ba dang / rgya cher bya ba dang nan tan du bya ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang yongs su bsam pa dang / rnam par dbye ba byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par 'gro ba'i
238a3(phal chen): khang pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od gang na ba der song ngo // der 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba/ khyim gi lha mo stong phrag bcu
238a4(phal chen): dang bcas pas bsu nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po shes rab dang ye shes chen pos rnam te nga par gnon pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gas
238a5(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i bsgom pa la lhag par dmigs pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang ldan pa/ chos dbyangs pa'i gzhal med kyi spyod yul// la spyod pa// chos kyi grong khyer la tu mngon par gzhol ba/ byang
238a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i thabs kyi tshul mtha' yas pas/ sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa rgyun gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par 'dul ba la rab tu snang ba'i
238a7(phal chen): spobs pa dang / ye shes mngon du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa'i lus kyis 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi seMs
238a8(phal chen): kyi dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i lam tu/ zhugs pa khyod byin pa legs so// mig phyir glan pa
238a9(phal chen): pa med pas spyad pa dang / spyod lam za ba cang rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul can khyod la blta na na/ khyod ni ring po mi thogs par de bzhini gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsungs dang thugs kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/ bla na med
238b1(phal chen): pa rab tu thong ste/ mtshan dang dpe byed pazang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i yus dang / bstobs bcu'i ye shes snang bas brgyan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten du rnam par spong bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyi brtson 'grus pa
238b2(phal chen): rnam par gnod dpal ltas na/ khyod ni ring po mthogs par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa mngon pa dang ldan zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgra ni yongs su 'dzin pa
238b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos zhi ba dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang gi dga' ba myong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab
238b4(phal chen): mor chud par gyur te// de'ang de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / blta ba dang bsnyen pa kun pa dang / gdam ngag ma nor bar blang ba dang / de'i yon tan la na
238b5(phal chen): tan du bya ba'i tshul la mkhas pa brtson par byed pas yongs su mi skye phyir mi'i ldog/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur te/ khyod la dgegs sam rab tu gcod pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gi
238b6(phal chen): kyang mi tshugs te/ bdud dam bdud kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun na gnas pa med pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni ring po ma thogs par sems can thams cad dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// 
238b7(phal chen): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i khang lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo khyod kyis ji skad tu smras pa de ltar 'gyur bar ro// 
238b8(phal chen): lha mo kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gtung ba rnam par zhi bas dga' bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi las nyam nga ba'i rnam par smin pa phyir log pa dang / sems can thams cad
238b9(phal chen): kyi bde ba 'grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la nan tan du byed pas/ dga' ba dam pa nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro// nam sems can de dag las dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshos
239a1(phal chen): mi bde ba'i sbyor bas/ sems rnam par 'khrugs shing / ngan song du ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ bde ba'i rgyud na gnas pa'i kyang / lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba snga
239a2(phal chen): tshigs nyams su myong bar gyur cing / mi dga' bar gnas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang shin tu yod mi bde bar 'gyur ro// lha mo 'di lta ste dper na mi shin tu dang gi byams pa zhig la/ 
239a3(phal chen): bu cig pa stug cing yid tu 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur la/ de'i yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa zhig mthong na/ shin tu ngang gis byams pa'i phyir/ rab tu yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar 'gyuro/ 
239a4(phal chen): lha me de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'ang / sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum gi rgyud tu ltung ba zhig mthong na// 
239a5(phal chen): rab tu mi dga' la shin tu nyams mi bde bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa yang dag par len pa'i rgyas lus
239a6(phal chen): zhizhig nas/ bde ba'i rgyud mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur tam/ lha dang mo'i lam gyi rgyud tu lus dang sems kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba zhig tu gyur na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde
239a7(phal chen): ba dang ldan zhing nyams bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang rab tu smra ba dang / dga' ba'i yid nyams su bde bar dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bdag gi don gyi phyir thams
239a8(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin te/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba rnam
239a9(phal chen): pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don tu gnyer bas ma ya ni/ 'du shes dang lta ba sems dang / lta ba phyini ci log tu gyur pa'i dbang gis ma yin// kun du sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang kun nas
239b1(phal chen): 'khor ba'i dbang tu gyur pas ma yin/ srid pa dang lta ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin/ sems can sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing 'jig pa'i dga' ba'i 'du shes kyis sems rnams par 'phel bas ma yin
239b2(phal chen): bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / bde ba myangs pa la yongs su tshogs pas ma yin/ spyi pa sna tshogs kyis bslabs shing / 'khor ba'i rgyud na 'dre ldog pa ma yini gi/ lha mo byang chub sems dpa'
239b3(phal chen): rnams ni/ sems 'khor ba'i rgya mtshon 'khor zhing // sdug bsngal dpag tu med pas shin tu mnar pa rnams la/ snying rje chen po skyed cing / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdus pa'i smon lam chen po
239b4(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub ste/ de dag ni snying rje chen pos smon lam mngon par bslab pa'i shugs kyis/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gtul ba la brtson zhing 'khor ba na byang chub sems dpa'
239b5(phal chen): spyod pa spyod par snang ngo // de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sgra'i pa thams cad rnam par bzlob pa'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes slob pa med pa yongs su tshol zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thas
239b6(phal chen): cad mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub po// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rab gro bya ba'i smon lam gi dbang gsi/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su skyo ba med de// de dag
239b7(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon myongs pa'o zhing ma mthong na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam par bslab po// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
239b8(phal chen): zhing yongs su sbyong zhing / sems can thams cad kyi skye mched sna tshogs mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sku tha dad pa med cing / bla na med pa langasu dag par bya ba'i phyin smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa// sems/ 
239b9(phal chen): can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kun nyon mongs par dang ldan pa mthong nas/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sra yam mngon par smra ba // 
240a1(phal chen): sems can skye mched ma tshang ba dang sems ci yongs su ma dag pa mthong na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yongs su sbyong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas yongs
240a2(phal chen): su skyo ba med do// lha mo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dpung med pa la spyod de// de ltar skyed pa ni lha dang mi phun sum
240a3(phal chen): tshogs pa yongs su bskyed pas// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyun du gyur pa yi ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir pha dang mar gyur pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam tu mdzud pa
240a4(phal chen): ma ma lta bur gyur pa yin/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa nga las bsrung ba'i phyir// lhan cig skyes pa'i lha rtag tu phye bzhin 'brangar ba lta bur gyur pa yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir// 
240a5(phal chen): mnyan pa chen po lta bur gyur pa yin/ btud dang nyon mongs pa/ kye'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur/ ba yin/ shin du bsil ba'i rang bzhi nye bar stobs pas/ gnas
240a6(phal chen): su gyur pa yin/ sangs rgya mtsho thams cad 'jug par byed pas/ mu stegs su gyur pa yin/ chos rin po che'i gla'i tu skyes pas/ mgon med par gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi me tog gis
240a7(phal chen): sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas/ me tog tu gyur pa ya ni/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od yangs pa rab tu 'gyed pas/ brgyan du gyur pa ya ni/ kun nas mdzes pas dga' ba dang bde ba dam pa byed pa la ni/ 
240a8(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba'i las la na tan du byed pas/ phrang na legs pa yin/ yan lag dam pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su tshang ba'i lus dang ldan pas/ kun du ba rang ba yin/ blta na mi mthun pa med pas gtang mi bran
240a9(phal chen): gzugs dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir/ 'o byed pa yin/ chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa'i phyir snang bar byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i phyir gsal bar/ 
240b1(phal chen): byed pa man// bdud kyi lam rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir/ dpag dpon du gyur pa yan/ shes rab kyi 'ang zer gyi dra ba rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa'i phyir/ nye bar gyur pa yang/ chos kyinam 'kha' la blo'i rdza
240b2(phal chen): mtshar bar byed pas/ zla bar gyur pa yani/ 'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi sman chen po'i char 'bebs pas spyan du gyur pa yin te/ lha mo de ltar nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams
240b3(phal chen): cad kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongasu 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal/ khyim gi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu ner bzangs la lha rdzas las/ 
240b4(phal chen): kyang 'das pa'i me tog dang phra ba dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dbyug pa dang / rin po che'i brgyan gyi char yid tu kyi rang bzhin mngon par phab ste/ phab nas bcing rjes su 'brangs nas byang chub
240b5(phal chen): sems dpa' khang par 'gro ba'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'du pa dag gis mngon par bstod do// byang chub rdzogs par thugs bskyed cing // sems can kun la thugs rtse bas// rgyal ba'i
240b6(phal chen): ye shes nyi ma'i rnams// bar 'ga' zhig na 'jig rten 'byung // bskal pa bye ba mang pos kyang // khyod kyi zhal mthong shin tu dka'// 'dzag rten ma rig mdangos pa la// khyod kyi ye shes nyi chen yin// mi shes rab rin
240b7(phal chen): bsgrubs pa yi// 'jig rten phyin ci log gzigs nas// thugs rje chen po rab bskyed de// khyod ni rang 'byung nyid du zhugs// khyod kyi dgongs pa rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas byang chub don du brtsom// dge ba shes
240b8(phal chen): bsnyen bkur bsnyen mdzad cing // lus srog 'phangs par mdzad mi mnga'// khyod ni 'jig rten rten mi mnga'// 'du mdzem mnga' gnas mo mnga'// 'dren pa ma mchis mo rten pas// dgongs pa thags med nam
240b9(phal chen): mkha' bzhin// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod mdzad cing // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bas// ye shes sman ma rab 'gyed pa// 'jig rten tshad med kun tu mtshar// 'jig rten nas kyang 'phangs mi mdzad/ 
241a1(phal chen): 'jig rten chos kyis yongs mi mgo/ chags pa med par 'jig rten spyod// mkha' la ser bu ji bzhin du// bskal pa'i me mer me bzhin du// rtag tu 'bar bas rab tu brtson// me lta bu'i brtson
241a2(phal chen): 'grus kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa mdzad// seng ge bzhin du shin tu dpa'// brtson 'grub rnam par gnon pa brtan// ye shes rnam par gnon dang ldan// gzhan gis thub pa med pa spyad// chos dbyings rgya
241a3(phal chen): mtsho 'di dag na// rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams ji snyed pa// der yang dge ba shes bsnyen bkur bas// dpa' bo khyod ni 'jug par gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mu
241a4(phal chen): ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la/ tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod de// de 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin chos 'dod pa'i don tu 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
241a5(phal chen): bzangs byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings/ rab tu snang ba'i 'od du phyin to// nang du song nas shAkya'i bu mo go pa mthong bar 'dod de/ kun tu bltas na kye shAkya'i bu/ 
241a6(phal chen): mo go pa byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa/ chos kyi dpyongs rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbus na bstan rin po che/ byang chub soms dpa' thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pa'i gzugs
241a7(phal chen): brnyan gyi pad mo'i snying po can zhig la bud med rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam pa/ sngon sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas shin tu bskus
241a8(phal chen): pata tshig snyan cing 'jam par smras pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don tu mngon du bya bas shin tu bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag bsgrub pa la de na mthun
241a9(phal chen): pas shin tu bzung ba/ snying rje chen po sngon 'gro bas bu dang / bu mo yongs su bzung ba'i tshul bcangs pa// byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khyim thab kyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su dag par byas pa// 
241b1(phal chen): sngon byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin par byas pa/ stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // bud med/ 
241b2(phal chen): stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
241b3(phal chen): bslab pa la gzhan gi dring mi 'jog pa/ chags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis skye ba'i yid ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi la tshul chags pas
241b4(phal chen): yongs su dag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon du bya ba'i semadas kyi shugs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang bar du gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba chags pa'i lam thams cad las shin du
241b5(phal chen): 'das pa// chos kyi dbying sku la legs par sprul pas rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su smin par bya dang // 'dul ba la mngon par phyogs pa/ bsod nams rgya mtsho
241b6(phal chen): dri ma med pas yongasu byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis shin tu byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs yangs pas ye shes
241b7(phal chen): kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kyis sems rab tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa sha stag go// de nas tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs shAkya'i bu me go pa ga na ba der phyin nas/ shAkya'i bu mo go pa'i rkang pa gnyis la
241b8(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar
241b9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na yongs su 'khor yang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang khong du chud la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'ang
242a1(phal chen): mi gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba yang rab tu thob la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa yang rgyun mi mchad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang rab tu gnas la de bzhin gshegs
242a2(phal chen): pa'i yul yongs su ston pa dang / 'jog rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las kyang yongs su 'das la// 'jig rten gyi lam rgyud thams cad du yang nye bar spyod padang / chos kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang ldan yang / 
242a3(phal chen): gzugs kyi lus kha dog mtha' yas pa'ang mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi sku la yang rab tu gzhol la/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha dog dang dbyibs kyi lus kyang yongs su ston pa dang / chos
242a4(phal chen): thams cad brjod tu mchis par yang rab tu rtogs la ngag gi las dang des pa'i tshig thams cad brjod pas kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sems can med par yang
242a5(phal chen): yang rab tu shes la/ sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i tshul las kyang mi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags par yang khongasu chud la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
242a6(phal chen): la mchod cing rim gror ba'i sbyor ba las kyang ma la phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad las las dang rnam par sman pa ma mchis pa yang rtogs la// dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang mi ldog
242a7(phal chen): ba ma 'tshal to// de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu mo ge pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba 'angs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos nyid rnam pa de lta bu dri bar
242a8(phal chen): thoms pa legs pa legs so// dri ba brjod par de dag kyang kun du bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i tshig go// rigs kyi bu de bsan lags par nyon la yang du yid la bzung shig dang / sangs rgyas
242a9(phal chen): kyi byin gros bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba ye shes kyi 'od kun du byung
242b1(phal chen): ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rlabs po che la brtan pa dang / mos pa rgya chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa rlabs po che rnam par dag pa dang / 
242b2(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rab tu brtan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa/ chen po thos po rab tu thob pa dang / tus gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la
242b3(phal chen): mos pa'i sems kyis gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs pa rab tu thob pa
242b4(phal chen): dang / rang bzhin gyi snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag nga pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu gcod pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob pa/ 
242b5(phal chen): ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam pa 'jo lta bu mag 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba/ 'od kun du
242b6(phal chen): byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa ni chos de dag thob par gyur nas kyang / mi zad pa'i tshul tu ba mngon par sgrub
242b7(phal chen): cing ma bsgom pa dang / shin tu rgya che bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur cing / rnam pa bcus mngon par dga' bar byed do// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi dang / 'khon
242b8(phal chen): ba'i yo byad don tu mo gnyer ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams ca
242b9(phal chen): las rnam par lta ba dang / srid pa rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen tu 'phags pa'i yid dang / gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la mi gnas mi rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sman
243a1(phal chen): lam la sgrib pa med pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor smra'i pa med pa shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi
243a2(phal chen): bu ches bcu papo de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge bo'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par dga' bar byed do// de nas shAkya'i bu ma go bas ngan de nyid yongs su bstan par
243a3(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas byid kyi phyogs bcur bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs shing / dge bshes dam pa bsnyen
243a4(phal chen): brtson g.yo dang sgyu med pa// ston pa'i 'du shes thob/ cing skye med brtson 'grus can// de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mig 'phrul skye ba 'dra 'di yan// gang rnams mas pa brlabs chen mkha'
243a5(phal chen): dadang 'dra ldan zhing // de'i khongs su tus gsum 'jig rten chud pa dang // zhing dang sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa/ ye shes 'od byed de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// gang rnams
243a6(phal chen): bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dpung med pa la// kun nas nyon mongs dri mas gos rab dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur ba// de dag spyod pa mag 'phrul
243a7(phal chen): gzhi'i rnam pa 'dra// kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad med bsam yas dag/ yon tan rgya mtshos yid brtsal nyer brtan pa// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho'i lus dag snying po ste// 'jig rten
243a8(phal chen): spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun gyis/ chos kyi 'brug sgra nyan kyang gang rnams mi ngoms shing // chos tshul rjes su stsogs pa'i shes rab
243b1(phal chen): 'od kyi sgron// de dag 'gro bar 'od gsal byed pa'i spyod 'di yi ni// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhini gshegs pa tshad med pa// gzhan dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun+da sems shing // 'du
243b2(phal chen): gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes byed pa// sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod yul 'dra yin no// rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par yangs pa'i 'khor mthong zhing // de dag ting 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho ma
243b3(phal chen): pa dang // smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med tshul 'jug pa// mig 'phrul lta bu de dag skyed pa 'di yin no// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin rlabs dang // phyi mtha'i bskal par spyod byed
243b4(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i rnams// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun/ tu gzugs brnyan byung gyur pa// chos 'odra byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di/ yin no// gang rnams ye shes nyi ma snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can
243b5(phal chen): 'gro ba nyam nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od snang bas// 'gro ba'i mun pa bsal cing brten pa 'char byung ba// nyi ma lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// skye dgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'gre ldog mthong
243b6(phal chen): gyur nas// ya gsal 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams phyir ldog rab gnas shing // chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su bsgrub byed pa// spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod// tshul 'dir slab pa de dag mtha'
243b7(phal chen): dang dpung med pa'i// lus rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan to// gzugs rnyan rang lus tshed mig yor 'dra ba'i lus tshad med pa// srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mung yongs smin byed// byams pa/ 
243b8(phal chen): tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste// mos pa sna tshogaso 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas// 'gro bar bsam pa ji bzhi ni chos kyi char 'bebs shing// brtan par byang chub don tu sems can khrag
244a1(phal chen): khrig 'dul// shan tu rgyam pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas lab po che zhes bya ba las// / bram po brgyam 'dun // donas shAkya'i bu bo gong sa
244a2(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pas de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya
244a3(phal chen): mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul thob pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul la rnam par blta
244a4(phal chen): ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di la snyoms parang zhugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi
244a5(phal chen): nad marjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong nang/ khong du chud do// bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam rgyud thams cad tu gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu sheso// 
244a6(phal chen): sems can de dag gi shi 'phro ba dang / skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las mngon tu byed pa yongs su bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod/ 
244a7(phal chen): pa dang / las rnam par smin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba'ang rab tu shes so// mi dge ba dang 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dang nges pa dang ma
244a8(phal chen): nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang / bag la nyal ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu zin
244a9(phal chen): kha dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang / de dag gi dge ba'i chos yong su 'phrul ba dang / sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa yang rab tu
244b1(phal chen): shes so// bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khongs su chud do// sangs
244b2(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa yang
244b3(phal chen): rab tu shes so// sngon gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgya mtsho yang rnams kyi drung du de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyar ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// 
244b4(phal chen): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgya yongs su rdzogs par rang mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang nga rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs
244b5(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / gdul rgya mtshoyang rab tu shes so// mngon pa 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa yang rab tu shes so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu
244b6(phal chen): dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam por 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang
244b7(phal chen): rab tu shes so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so// sngo gi dge ba'i rtse ba yang rab tu shes so// lamo bsgom pa sna tshogs kyang
244b8(phal chen): rab tu shes so// ye shes tho'i par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji stod cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa/ 
244b9(phal chen): de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khyong du chud pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
245a1(phal chen): kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag
245a2(phal chen): gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas
245a3(phal chen): de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyad cing / rnam par thar pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par rtsa ba
245a4(phal chen): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji ste/ red pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
245a5(phal chen): de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dra// pa'i de dag gis theg pa dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dag kyang rab tu/ 
245a6(phal chen): shes so// thog ma sems bskyed pa'i smon las dag kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam rnam pa tha dad po dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas/ 'byung ba'i rgyun thams cad mngon par
245a7(phal chen): bsgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' lam la nan tan tu bya ba'i rgyan rnam
245a8(phal chen): pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs su gnan pa'i shugs drag po rnam pa the dang
245a9(phal chen): pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bathem pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par
245b1(phal chen): rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems
245b2(phal chen): dpa'i sa bsgom pa'i rgyud dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyang ba'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// 
245b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i dbang dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'dar ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shos so// byang chub
245b4(phal chen): sems dpa' yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa la yang
245b5(phal chen): dag par gnas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so// byang chub semasadapa' spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes pa/ 
245b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya patsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar po rgya mcho dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag sems kyi skang cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya
245b7(phal chen): mam ma rtogs zab par byed pa dag kyang rang rdzun pas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid kyi snang ba'i mular 'thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi drug gasdang ba'i smon ngas kyang ra/ 
245b8(phal chen): tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhang
245b9(phal chen): rgya ba rdo rjes su bgrang bar byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes mo// chas rgya bajo'i tshul 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
246a1(phal chen): par spyod pa'i rdul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par 'phrul ba sngo tshogs rtsa
246a2(phal chen): mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu ma kho mo ji ltar mo 'dzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa skal pa sna tshogs kyang rgya mtsho la zhugs te/ khong du chud nga/ 
246a3(phal chen): de bzhin du/ phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de rgyun mi mchad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// ma mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa
246a4(phal chen): de bzhin du/ mi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i dang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams da cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi mdzad
246a5(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasagacig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal rgya ma tshe ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jigs rten
246a6(phal chen): gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i thams cad kyi bskal pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ 
246a7(phal chen): rnal shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ba thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar sa shes pa de bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
246a8(phal chen): khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mo mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas
246a9(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa/ gcig nas gcig/ 
246b1(phal chen): tu brgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mche dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mang ba chags su gcig nas gcig tu
246b2(phal chen): btsud pa dag na gnas pa'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ phyogs kun tu 'dzirnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
246b3(phal chen): tu rtogs pa'i/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi brgya bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgyang
246b4(phal chen): gtogs pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bsal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ phyogs kun du 'od rnam par snang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgyad
246b5(phal chen): phyogs bcur mdab chags pa su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ la gnas pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig rje/ sa gcig tu brgyud pa rnams kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho dag kyang
246b6(phal chen): rab tu shes so// phyogs kun du 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'dzer/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgyud phyogs bcur mngab chags su/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i/ 
246b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du/ gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs
246b8(phal chen): pa'i 'jog rten gi khams 'jam klas pa rnams kyi/ bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
246b9(phal chen): 'khor lo rnams dang / 'jig rten gi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'jig rten gi khams bye brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gi khams chu klung rnam dang / 'jig rten gi khams
247a1(phal chen): gleng rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang / 'kha 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang / 
247a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sdong po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rta 'ag ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams ma'i tu bye ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes// 
247a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhing dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho
247a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthus na gtugs pa dag gi/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang / mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsha dag kyang rab tu shes// 
247a5(phal chen): rjes su dran no// sngon gi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes nakhong du chud do// sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya ma tshe dag la 'ang shes shi'i khong du chud do// bskal pa
247a6(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med par/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par zhugs par mdzad pa dag par shes pa shang khong du chud do// zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing
247a7(phal chen): khong tu chud do// sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i tshul thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sdong gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam
247a8(phal chen): par 'phrul pa dag kyang shes shing khong tu chud do// sngon gi de bzhini gshegs pa mchod cing rim 'gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag
247b1(phal chen): gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bsngon byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyed pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// yo byad la dbang
247b2(phal chen): sbyar ba rab tu brnyes pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bsngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan tu mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
247b3(phal chen): da phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khang du chud do// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang rdul shugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag
247b4(phal chen): kyang shes shong khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa'in bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po
247b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bsam gan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud ngo // shes rab tu
247b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du/ sku'i gzugs brnyan yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i
247b7(phal chen): thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
247b8(phal chen): ye shes snang bar gyur pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ying byang chub yongs su gnan pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du
248a1(phal chen): tshud do// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya
248a2(phal chen): mtsho dag kyang khong du chud do// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par
248a3(phal chen): rol pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong tu chud do// 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' thams
248a4(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// thog ma'i smon lam gi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sems can yongs su smin par byed pa
248a5(phal chen): dang / 'dul ba'i thabs rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa' sbyong ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin
248a6(phal chen): par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sems can de dag gi sems kyi skad cig re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// ting nge
248a7(phal chen): 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// gzungs kyi sgo rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// spobs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
248a8(phal chen): dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// spyod pa'i dran
248a9(phal chen): pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong tu chud do// mthar kyis yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khang tu chud do// de dag
248b1(phal chen): gad pa nga na pa dang byang chu kyi ya lag das khams gtan dang rnapa par gdas thar ba dang / t+ye 'dzidi dang sgoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mdo ga kyang zhes nad zang tshun dang // mang+ga
248b2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnam par spang ba dang kyi sangs rgya dang / byang chubasams dpa' byung ba rgya ba mnas kyi byings thams cad tu 'byung ba shes nang 'dzin chung // bdod par 'dru ba nga ba'ad kyi/ de'i ni
248b3(phal chen): gshegs la thams cad kyi mangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa rgya ma cha dang / ye shes kyi sgru ba 'dra ba mtha' las pa la 'jug pa/ chos kyang brim datha' mam pa rgyas par 'byings pa/ rnam
248b4(phal chen): yam pa nas shin du bstan par bya ba'i phyi ma'i mtha' brnal padaganas pa la 'dug pas bsnyen par bya ba phyogs bcu'i 'dzi ngag rten ga khams rgya ma ro'i tshul kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa/ rnapa
248b5(phal chen): mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing khong du chud de// mngon par bsgrub bo// de ci'i 'byor ni/ na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang drub
248b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta po'i yul ni de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyad pa'i tshul rab tu shes so// 
248b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshigs kyang rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so// sems can gyi las
248b8(phal chen): sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so// nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so// nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yang rab tu tha shes so// rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
248b9(phal chen): rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shis khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam
249a1(phal chen): par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
249a2(phal chen): bzangs kyis/ shAkya'i bu mo go pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam
249a3(phal chen): par blta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ci srid cig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol gcig tu// 'dzag rten
249a4(phal chen): gi khams mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bskal po grangs med pa'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus su gleng bzhi pa
249a5(phal chen): bde ba yod pa zhes bya ba zung ste/ gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam du'o/ glang gi dbus su/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dang / la zhes bya ba/ grong rdal stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa ba ni
249a6(phal chen): 'i phul bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bye'i dpal 'di la/ grong rdal stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang / so so nas sa'i gzhi bye dUr+ya sngon po las grub pa la gnas pa/ 
249a7(phal chen): rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba'ongs spos chub yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog
249a8(phal chen): bun d+ha ri ka shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dang / kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing dri shin du zhom pa/ kun nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che las byas pa'i stegs bu
249a9(phal chen): 'i khri 'phang bdun las/ ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun la gas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs bdun gi nags tshal gi phreng ba dgrogs pas kun nas bskor ba/ steng nas gser gyi/ 
249b1(phal chen): dra bas bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par phye ba'i mig mangs rim mdzes par rnam par bres pas/ sa gzhi shin du sba bar gyur pa/ dngos sgrub can gyi tshogs dam par rgyu ba/ ba tsun/ 
249b2(phal chen): ba'i ha khyus sgra skad yad tu 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba brgya phrag stong gso mdzes par byas pa/ shin tu bskyed cing phun sum tshogs par gnas pa/ 
249b3(phal chen): skyes pa dang bud med brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba/ ser bu bde zhing yang du 'ong bas bskyed de/ me tog gi char mang po rgyun mi mchad par rab tu 'phrul pa/ sa'i bdag po byargya brag
249b4(phal chen): stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste/ grong rdal chen po de dag dgi rin po che'i shing thams cad dang gser gi dra ba'i brgyan da la sogs pa rlung gas bskyod de/ rol mo mang po'i
249b5(phal chen): sgra dang mnyam pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad ces byung ngo // gsol cig/ gnams shig/ chos la spyod cig/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
249b6(phal chen): cig/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mnga' thob par mdzod cig/ khyed rnams blar gyur cig ces zer ro// rgyal po'i gnas ri bo'i sdong po'i ri bo'i dpal der/ khams kyi rgyal po nor gi bdag po
249b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi yod do// blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te/ rgyal po nor gi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa de thams cad kyang
249b8(phal chen): dpa' bo rtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ shin du mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha
249b9(phal chen): stag go/ rgyal po nor gi bdag po de'i btsun mo dam pa ni/ pad mo'i dpal dam byu byung ba ste/ bud med stong phrag brgyad cu brtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas btsun mor bya ba'o// de'i bu gzi brjod kyi
250a1(phal chen): dbang po zhes bya ba/ gzugs babang ba shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ma chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur te// 
250a2(phal chen): de la me chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur te/ de'ang 'di ltar rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de la/ rkang pa'i mthil shin du gnas pa dang ldan te/ 
250a3(phal chen): sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthol 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la/ 'dreg na mnyam por 'dag ste/ gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil kun gi sa chen po la mnyam par reg go// de'i rkang pa'i mthal
250a4(phal chen): gnyis la mkhor lo brtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas mo khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cadadu shan tu tshang ba shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na stug pa
250a5(phal chen): dag kyang byung bar gyur to// de'i rkang pa'i bol gnyisas kyang shin du rgyas par gyur te/ rkang pa'i steng gi mdo// ga shin du gsali la shin tu mdzes te/ me tog dam
250a6(phal chen): pa bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur to// de'i rkang lag gi so mo dra bas 'brel bar gyur to// shin tu mdzes pas rnam par phye ba/ bu ga med pas
250a7(phal chen): zag pa med pa ni dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas bsrung lta bur gyur to// de'i rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ shin tu dag la/ shin tu bstsal pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi
250a8(phal chen): 'od rab tu 'gyed par 'grub par gyur to// de'i ser mo rnams kyang radri zhing bzlum la/ tshigs par gnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de mnyam par sa la 'jog go// 
250a9(phal chen): mnyam par sa las 'deg go// de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang tsa ka la 'dri bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te/ des skyes pa 'am bud med dam khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg
250b1(phal chen): kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bde ba dang yid dga' ba'i dam pa tsham zhing yang shin du bde bar 'gyur ro// de byin pa ri dgas e n+ya'i byin pa lta bu 'dug par gyur te/ rims kyis gzhol
250b2(phal chen): ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa dang / legs par grub par gyur pas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po e ne ya ltar/ de la sus kyang bsngags pa 'am/ slengs par mi nus te/ 'gro bas ngal zhing
250b3(phal chen): tub bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la shin tu mtho ba/ zlum la shin du legs pa dang / shin tu
250b4(phal chen): rgyas pa dang / tshigs mi sdang ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / blta na sdug pa gnyis grub par gyur to// legs pa la gnyis thal gong gi lhun la gnyis/ 
250b5(phal chen): lhag pa la gnyis te de ltar bdun no// de'i tshe mtshan bsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa grub par gyur te/ de'i bas nga ba'i gnas sbubs na 'dug pa shin tu mi mngon la/ 
250b6(phal chen): nang du nub cing kun nas par 'dug pa ste/ dper na glang po cang shes sam/ rta cang shes ltar 'dug pas/ de gos ma gyon par 'dug kyang / bud med dam skyes pa 'am/ 
250b7(phal chen): khye'u ma'am bu mo 'am/ rgan pa'am daral bab pa 'am/ bla ma 'am/ bla mar bya ba rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na bdag longs par spyad pa dang / ched du bstan
250b8(phal chen): par byas te/ 'dod pas spyad pa na ma gtogs so// rgyal bu gzhan nu ga re brjid kyi bdag po de/ ro bstod mi ge ltar 'dug pa dang ljon par gyur te/ lum
250b9(phal chen): pas rgyas la/ ro stod shin tu yangs shing rdzogs pas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par/ dbyibs shin tu legs pa'i ro stod dang ldan par gyur pa/ de'i thal gong rgyas
251a1(phal chen): shing lus shin tu rgyas pa/ lus rnam par bye ba/ lus kyi cha thams cad kyang gyen tu 'bab par mnyam pa/ lus la dma' ba med pa/ lus mtho' ba med pa
251a2(phal chen): lus zhum pa med pa/ lus la dgu pa med pa/ lus rin po che'i rten pa/ shin tu phyis pA kyang lhag par gas lta bur gyur to// de'i dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing shes rgyas la
251a3(phal chen): shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to// des me chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin tu ring ba thob par gyur pa des/ lus ma btud te lus drang por 'dug kyang / pus mo'i lha
251a4(phal chen): nga gnyis la nyug cing rig ge/ des mi chen po'imatshan lus che zhang drang ba'ang thob par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la/ tshul
251a5(phal chen): dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang / lus rab tu gnyen pa dang / lus shin du lci ba dang / lus rab tu gsal ba dang / lus shin tu sim pa byed pa dang ldan
251a6(phal chen): par gyur to// des ma chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ mi dma' ba'o mgul dang / de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang / gzhan gyi dkyil 'a
251a7(phal chen): thams cad na rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shin tu mnyam par gyur te/ kun kyang rab tu tshang bar gyur to// mi chen po mtshan seng ge'i mgram pa lta bu yang
251a8(phal chen): thob par gyur te/ za 'gram shin tu mkhregs dang / gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang / gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs shing yongs su dag pa dang / kha'i sgo
251a9(phal chen): shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to// mchen po'i mtshan po mnyam bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te// so ma tshang ba med la/ zas zhig za na 'ang lan cig blud pas chung tu 'bras
251b1(phal chen): can gi 'bru 'ga' yang ma zhib par za ba med do// so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa rab tu thob ste/ mtshams chu sgo med pa dang / shin tu mnyam pa dang / rkyen shin tu mdzes pa ste/ 
251b2(phal chen): de kha zas zhig za na ya mgo ba dang / ma chags pa dang / zhen pa dang / ldan ljin tu gyur pa 'am/ thogs par 'gyur ba 'am/ gseb 'grang bar 'gyur ba med do// ma chen po'i mtshan
251b3(phal chen): so mnyam par 'a rab tu thob par gyur te/ so mnyam zhing rnga rngo med pa dang / so lhag med pa dang / so zhug pa med pa dang / so gyes pa med pa dang / so thag drung mnyam pa dang / so rdo ba med
251b4(phal chen): par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i mchi ba dkar shan tu dkarang bar gyur te/ mchi bskyon med pa/ mchi ba shin du gsal ba/ mchi ba shin du dag pa/ mchi shin tu brtan par
251b5(phal chen): gyur to// ma chen po'i mtshan lce shin tu yangs pa yang thob par gyur te/ de'i lce ni shin tu yangs la srab cing gnyen te/ shan tu 'jam pa dang / las su rung ba dang / 
251b6(phal chen): yid tu 'ong ba dang / bsgyur na bde ba dang / gdong gi dkyil 'khor du kun du 'gengs pa dang / bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang / yi ge dang ngag dang nges pa'i tshig thogs pa med
251b7(phal chen): papar brjod par gyur to// gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ dbyings yid du 'ong ba dang / rol me'i sgra dang / glu'i nga ro dang snyil snyan gyi dbyangs dang / sgra skad dang brjod
251b8(phal chen): cing smras pa'i tshig las yang du 'ong ba'i brjod pas/ ngag gi las mngon par dga' ba bskyed pa/ 'jig rten mngon par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang / lhag pa'i dbyings
251b9(phal chen): kyis ngag brjod de// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang gung du mi 'da' bar thams cad kyi yid dang / mthun par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de ni mig dkar nag 'byed par
252a1(phal chen): par gyur te// ma ga shin tu dang ba dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / mig la 'od chags pa dang / mig rnam par gsal ba dang / mig mngon par mdzes pa dang / mig
252a2(phal chen): blta na stug pa dang / mag yid du 'ong ba dang / mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de ni rdzi ma lta bu'i rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa te/ mig gi skye mched rin po che pad ma rag lta
252a3(phal chen): shin tu dge pa/ mig gri sprin mnyam pa/ mig gi sIni mtshungs pa/ mig go sprin legs pa/ mig gi sprin yangs pa/ mig gi sprin rdzogs pa/ mig gi sprin tu shin brtan par gyur te/ de'i
252a4(phal chen): smin mtshams su mdzod sru skyes par gyur te/ 'jam pa las nga su rung ba/ shin du gnyen pa/ shing bal ltar reg na bude ba / gsal ba yang yod pa/ tsha rom lta bu kha ba'i kha dog
252a5(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gi 'od rab tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur to// de'i spyi bo la gar+b+ha tig tor mngon par sgrub par gyur te/ sha ni tu legs pa/ 
252a6(phal chen): kun nas zlum pa/ dbus su bab pa/ skra'i brgyan tu gyur pa/ rin po che'i pad mo 'dab ma snad bye ba brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa kun nas cha mnyam par gnas pa/ ra ni tang gdab tu tshad med
252a7(phal chen): pas gces pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon rngan de pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i lus la rdul ta ma/ dri ma 'am/ rtul ta ma ser
252a8(phal chen): ka 'am/ gnyer ma 'am/ ldod pa'am/ 'khums pa'am/ 'phyang ba 'am/ spod pag tu gnas pa med gyur to// gzhon nu don mdog gser gi kha dog lta bu dang ldan par
252a9(phal chen): gyur te/ 'dzam bu ka chu klung gi gser gi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhang / 'od kun tu mdom gang ba dang / gser ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan padas
252b1(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhom pa'i 'od zer byung bas/ lus kyi brgyan rab rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de ni bu sku'i sgo re rer byung ba dang ldan par gyur
252b2(phal chen): te/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu'i re re skyes par gyur pa/ bye dUr+ya bsngon po'i kha dog lta bu g.yas phyogs su mkhyil ba legs par skyes pa/ mthang la zha bar 'dug pa/ shin tu
252b3(phal chen): legs par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i sku yan lag gyen du mkhyil bar gyur te/ bya ri mi bzlogs pa'i sku dang / mi ldog pa'i sku dang / ma 'dres pa'i sku dang
252b4(phal chen): ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i mo chen po'i mtshan sna mthon thi tu 'dug pa ma thob par gyur te/ de'i sgra nor burin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthon 'thing du 'dug pa
252b5(phal chen): 'jam pa snum pa/ logs par mkhyil ba/ g.yas/ phyogs su mkhyil pa/ drung shin du nar pa/ zad zed med pa/ 'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pa/ mi 'dzings pa/ 
252b6(phal chen): dbyibs mnyam zhing mthun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon nu de shang nya gro ta ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/ kun nas rkyen tu ran
252b7(phal chen): pa dang / kun tu bzang ba dang / kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de ni mdun nas bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing blta na yid du 'ong la/ rgyab dang g.yas g.yon dang / 
252b8(phal chen): 'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang nyal ba dang / smra ba dang mi smra ba 'dug pa la bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing / yad du 'ong ba la blta na sdud par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu
252b9(phal chen): rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis yongasu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bltas na yang
253a1(phal chen): yid tu mi 'ong ba'i bag med pa/ blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba de lta
253a2(phal chen): bu zhig skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de nas lan gcig gcig rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de/ yab kyis gnang nas rgyal po'i sdong po'i ri bo'i dpal gyi bza' shing gi ra ba
253a3(phal chen): sdes kyi mi gu'i rtse mo las/ 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir/ bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu/ bsod nas kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gi bskal pa bzang
253a4(phal chen): po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung nas/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas dga' bar bya zhing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gi shing rta rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen
253a5(phal chen): po bzhi dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu bo che'i srog shing sra ba/ tsan dan dam pa las byung bsgrub pa'i yu ba bzang po dang / ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sras sna tshogs kyi
253a6(phal chen): shing thags rnam par bkye ba/ rin po che thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ran po che thams cad kyi dra ba kun nas yog pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri ran po
253a7(phal chen): che dam pa'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus su bshams pa/ bu mo lnga rgyas rin po che'i srid bu'i lde ldi nas yongs su bzung ba/ nam mkha' la chags pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta
253a8(phal chen): cang shes stong la bcas pa la zhon nas/ gtugs chen po rims kyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa/ steng g.yogs rin po che'i rgyal po bye dUr+ya dkar po las byas pa'i 'od dri ma med pa tshang
253a9(phal chen): med pa/ 'byung ba rin po che bsam gis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba sna tshogs thams cad kyis sra bar sbas te/ rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par rgyan par brgyan pa/ yu ba rin po che'i rgyal
253b1(phal chen): khye r+ya bsngon po las bsgreng bas ni bskyab/ srog chags brgya stong mang pos ni yongs su bskor// rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs ya du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag ni rab tu
253b2(phal chen): blangs me tog gi char chen po ni mngon par bab/ lha rdzas kyi spos dri zhim pa'i bdug spos kyi snod bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni rab tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to// de de ltar
253b3(phal chen): 'gro ba'i tshe/ lam yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te/ mthon dman med pa dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo med pa dang / gser dngul dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi
253b4(phal chen): khams kyis/ sa gzhi rab tu bsgrungs pa dang / gser gi phye dam bkram pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil dmas chal du par bkang ba dang / g.yas g.yon
253b5(phal chen): nas rin po che'i shing gi phreng bas 'grogs pa dang / rin po mo sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang / steng nas rin po che'i/ dril bu dra ba bres pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol
253b6(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis bkab pa/ rani po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa tu ma bsgreng zhing sbyangs pas/ mdzes par brgyan pa dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin
253b7(phal chen): po che'i stegs bu'i phreng ba rnam par bkod pas/ rnam par brgyan pa ste/ rin po che'i stegs bu la la ni slong mo pa'i tshogs la yongs su bstabs pa'i don la rin po che'o snod sna tshogs rin po
253b8(phal chen): che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba bkod/ stegs pu la la la ni rgyan 'dod pa'i slongs mo pa rnam par brgyan pa'i don du/ rin po che thams cad kyis rgyan kyis rnam par yongs su
253b9(phal chen): bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni/ su cog
254a1(phal chen): 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du khabs dang / btung ba dang ra bro ba sna tshogs kyis chu yongs su bkang ba'i snong mang po bkod/ skegs bu la la la ni/ rnam
254a2(phal chen): thams cad mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang / kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg yid tu 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rnam pa dkad/ stegs pu la la la ni ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rjes kyi
254a3(phal chen): shang thog sna tshogs thams cad sbyangs/ stegs bu la la la ni/ gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du gzung ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dge sna tshogs dang ldan
254a4(phal chen): pa/ mdoge bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ri mau/ sna tshogs sha ni tu swa bar rnam par phye ba shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa/ sha ni phra ba/ rab tu 'jam pa thags su ma btags pa/ 
254a5(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong phrag snyed yongs su bkod par gyur to// / stegs bu la la la ni byug pa 'dod pa'o sems can rnams pasam pa ji lta 'ab bzhin tu yongs su spyod tu bzud pa'i phyir// 
254a6(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa kha dog dang dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad ldan pa dag bkod par gyur to// stegs bu la la la ni sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin na du yongs su spyod tu gzung ba'i
254a7(phal chen): phyir ro// yod byed thams cad kyi phung po dag bkod par gyur to// stegs bu la la la ni na chung gzugs bzang ba/ rab tu mdzes pa shin tu stug pa/ cha lus stug gu sna tshogs dang ldan pa// 
254a8(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs gyon pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul stug gur brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bud med kyi bzo dang sbyangs
254b1(phal chen): dang / shes nyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag bkod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de nyid na/ sbrul chung ma'i dam pa rgyal po'i spyod longs spyod du 'os pa/ blta na
254b2(phal chen): mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ha cang yang mi rong ba/ ha cang yang mo thung
254b3(phal chen): ha cang yang mi sbom/ ha cang yang mi 'phra/ ha cang yang maM dkar/ ha cang yang mi bsngo ba/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa zhig yid du 'ong ba/ tshangs pa'i
254b4(phal chen): dbyangs dang ldan pa 'jam zhing snyan par sbas pa/ shes/ rab dang ldan pa/ shes nyen gyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa/ gtsug lug thams cad la shes pa/ brtson pa le lo med
254b5(phal chen): go rim gro yod pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa'o/ sems bdog pa/ khod khro ba mi mnga' ba/ blta na mi ngoms shing yid du 'ong / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti
254b6(phal chen): mug chung ba ngo shes shing khrel yod pa/ drang zhing mnyen pa g.yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de/ de ma dang lhan cig tu bu mo tu ma zhig gis bskor te/ rin po che'i shing rta la zhon nas/ rgyal po'i gnas
254b7(phal chen): sdang po'i ri bo'i dpal nas zung ste/ rgyal po'i bka' bstsal nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bzo brjod kyi bdag po'i mdun nas par/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de glur len cing 'dod 'dong pa las
254b8(phal chen): rgyal bu gzhon nu ga N+DI brjid kyi bdag pa mthong nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems shin du mi bzad pa zhig g.yos te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shin tu yad du 'od ches nas/ 
255a1(phal chen): rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas/ ma byalta na stug pa la 'di skad ces smra so// ma 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig/ gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi rdzid
255a2(phal chen): kyi dbang po la ma btang na ni/ 'gum pa'i 'am srog la bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu gyur ro// des smras pa/ bu mo de lta bu'i sems ma bskyed cig/ gzhon nu 'di ni 'khor los sgyurare
255a3(phal chen): ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de'i yab nor gyi bdag po mi bzhugs par gyur na// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par gyur pa'i gnas yod de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gyur
255a4(phal chen): pas/ de'i bud med rin po che nam mkha' las 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ bu mo bdag cag kyang sbrul tshad mdag cig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin/ 
255a5(phal chen): gyi yu bus sems can 'ga' zhig la nam mtsho'i bar/ tu bsnyen bkur mi byer mi rung ba'ang med de/ yu bu ni rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i bkres/ rgyal bu gzhan nu
255a6(phal chen): gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim gror 'dod 'dong bar zad kyis/ de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cag/ gnas 'di ni the bo par yong shin tu bka' ngo // de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
255a7(phal chen): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes pa 'dul
255a8(phal chen): 'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin shin tu skrag pa'i 'od ces bya ba yang gza' shing / 
255a9(phal chen): gir bsngos kyi mig gu'i rtse mo las/ 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i nang tu byung ste/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
255b1(phal chen): nas zhag bdun lon pa de/ bu mo de shing rta la bzhon bzhin tu/ yur zhing 'chog 'chog pa'i rmi lam du mthong nas sad par gyur pa dang / sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhag gas
255b2(phal chen): bstan pa bu mo de bzhini gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa de ni snying po byang chub chos kyi sgra ni shin du stug pa'i 'od ces bya ba na/ rnam par spyod cing thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
255b3(phal chen): zhag bdun lon te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yon dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye
255b4(phal chen): chen po dang / tshungs pa dang gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min tshang gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun tu byas shing zhugs te/ der sa 'i lha mo thams cad dang kun nas 'dus chu'i lha mo dang
255b5(phal chen): me'i lha mo dang chung gi lha mo dang / rgya mtsho'i lha mo dang / chu klung gi lha mo dang ri'i lha mo dang mtshan mo lha mo dang / skye reng mtshar ba'i lha mo dang / nags tshal gyi lha mo dang / 
255b6(phal chen): shing gi lha mo dang sman gyi lha mo dang / me tog gi lha mo dang / grong khyer gyo lha mo dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang / snying po byang chub kyi lha mo dang / lus kyi 'od zer gyi lha mo dang / sems
255b7(phal chen): can gyis wA ris kyi lha mo dang / nam mkha'i lha mo dang / phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das su nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba'i phyir/ kun nas 'dus so zhes nas
255b8(phal chen): de ltar des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha ba med par gyur te/ skabs su bab nas/ rgyal bu gzhon tu gzo brjod kyi bdag
255b9(phal chen): mdun du de'i tshe tshigs su btsad pa 'di dag smras so// gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// yon tan rnams kyi thams cad phyogs su 'grogs// shes rab stobs kyis
256a1(phal chen): bdag dang 'dra ba ma mchis/ sku la dga' ba sgra d+ma'i tshul kun 'jal/ grogs chags mang po stong phrag tu 'do chags dang nis 'dag la rang na
256a2(phal chen): gan na bdag ni 'dzis chen gdul 'ang // blo brtags pa'i gyur pa gcig pa 'jig dag pa'ang ni bang gyu pa pa
256a3(phal chen): gyur/ gang la ra'ang dgra pa bdag den mo sdang // bdag ni sems can smon par dga' ba dang / lags// sku gzhan su mchog rab yon tan rab mnga' khyod// gang rje bdag gis gsal bar
256a4(phal chen): mdzang gyur pa// de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde/ rgyal chen yangs par shin du dga' bar gyur// khyod kyi dbu bzang ljang lo 'khyil ba ni// / rin chen rnam snang mdag tu
256a5(phal chen): mthon mthing gsal// zhal gi smon sdug bkral pa shangs su mdzes// khyod kyi zhal sngar lus ni bdag 'bul lo// mtshan gi rab mtshang gzi brjid che mnga' ba// sku
256a6(phal chen): gzugs gser gyi ri bo bzang po 'dra// khyod kyi spyan sngar bdog blta ma mdzes te// zil tu brlag pas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyang 'dra// spyan gsal ring la dkar nag 'byes pa mdzes
256a7(phal chen): shin tu zhal rgyas seng ge'i 'gram pa can// khyed kyi gsung ni thogs pa ma mchis na// gsung mchog mnga' bas bdag ni bzung du gsal// khyod kyi zhal na ljags yangs mnga' ma
256a8(phal chen): ni mdog dmar yangs pa rin chen mchog gi 'od// tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi gsung mnga' ba// gsung zhing 'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad// khyed kyi zhal na thigs bzang
256a9(phal chen): tshems mnga' ba// dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsol// 'dzum zhing gzhad pa rnam par ston pa kyang // skyes bu dpa' khyod 'gro bar dga' ba mdzad// khyod kyi la mtshan rab mdzes
256b1(phal chen): bas rnams// sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag cing 'od kyang gsal// su gzugs bzang po yongs su des brgyan pas// mi'i dbang po 'khol lo sgyur bar bya// shin tu
256b2(phal chen): rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa// / dam po brgya rtsa brgyad pa// de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi
256b3(phal chen): bdag pos/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// bu mo khyod su'i khyod la yongs su bsrung ba ni gang zhig yon/ bu mo nga la ni gzhan gas yongs su bcu
256b4(phal chen): ba'i bud med bdag gir byar mi rung ngo zhes nas// de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// blta stug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan pa// mtshan bzangs
256b5(phal chen): bsod nams blar dag pa'i lus// khyod la dri ba'i don 'di nga la spos// lus mchog khyod ni su'i sa yongs su bzung // khyod la pa dang ma ni yod dmar med/ khyi
256b6(phal chen): thab med dam khyod ni su zhag dbang // gzugs mdzes khyod la sems can gzhan nam cig/ bdag gar yan par 'du sheso byed dam// khyod kyi yid ni bsod la mi dga' drang // gzhan
256b7(phal chen): las ma byin 'phrog par mi byed dam// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa mi dga' dang // brdzun tu brjod slar yad ni mi mos sam// khyod kyi blo gros mdza' dbyen mi 'jug gam// tshig
256b8(phal chen): brlang gzhan la gnod par mo smra 'grang // gzhan gnor la chags pa'i sems med dam// 'gro ba rnams la gnod par mi sems dang // blta ba'i 'brog don lam du ma zhugs drang // 
256b9(phal chen): las kyi rgyu la yi brngam sems med dam// g.yo mdog sgyu ma'i'o dbang du mi 'gro 'am// mi 'ther 'jig rten gnon par mi byed drang // pha ma gnyen dang 'amadza' bshes bla ma la// swa
257a1(phal chen): rim 'gro bya ba'i tshul mtshang ngam// phongs par gyur pa yongs su myu don du// khyod kyi yad la sbyin par sems yong dang// chos dang mthun par dus su 'dems byed
257a2(phal chen): yus dang sems yid yongs su dag byed la// yang dag las su rung ba skyed byed pa'o// dge shes rnams la dga' 'ar sems yid dam// sangs rgyas lha rlom gror sems ldan po
257a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam med// gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skyes gyur pa'i// chos kyi dam pa de ni shes mi shes// chos yad mchog le gnas par khyed byed dang / 
257a4(phal chen): chos srin spyod pa'i blo gros med drang ngo // legs na pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtshol// gus pa'i sri zhu dga' sems mngag yod dam// skye bo mgon med phongs par gyur pa'o// 
257a5(phal chen): 'dren pa rnams la byams pa'i yid yod dam// ngan song 'gro ba'i lam la zhugs pa yi// shin tu nyams thag snying rje te sems drang ngo // gzhan gi phun sum tshogs pa
257a6(phal chen): mthong gyur na/ khyod ni dga' ba'i mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram// skye bo nyon mongs rnams kyis khol gyur pa// shes rab mthu bo skyong btang snyoms byed mo byed// mi shes gnying
257a7(phal chen): log skye bo mang mthong na// byang chub dam pa smon lam 'debs byed drang // bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod byed na// smon lam dam pas skyo bar mi 'gyur grang // de nas bu mo dga'/ 
257a8(phal chen): ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i mu// sbrul tshong ma'i rtse mo blta na stug pas// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag gi bu mo 'di ni rdzus
257a9(phal chen): te byung ba pad mo'i nang nas skyes pa ste// sngon cang khyim gyi nang nas phyi rol du ma byung ngo zhes nas// / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bu mo 'di la khyod kyis gang sbas sapa// 
257b1(phal chen): de ni bdag gi rim pas khyod la brjod// dza kar bur 'ang skyes bskyed bskyed pa// bdag gis khyod la gsol gas gsan du gsol// gang che dgung sangos khyod do ngasnyam gyur pa/ 
257b2(phal chen): bdag gi bu mo 'di skyes so// brdzus te dri med pad mo'i srubs nas byung // yan lag kun tshang mog yangs 'di yang skyes// dus kyi rang na sos ka dus mchog le// sman dang lo ton
